story:
For ten years, Podtacular: The Unofficial Halo Universe Podcast has provided the Halo community with a central source for franchise and community news spanning all facets of the Halo universe.  It has been through the efforts of the community we have made it to this milestone and we could not be more thankful.

To celebrate this momentous occasion, we are throwing a reunion party during RTX 2015 in Austin, TX.  Whether you're a long-lasting listener of the podcast or a recent subscriber, this party is dedicated to those who have supported us and we want to go big!

Since taking ownership of Podtacular back in 2008, I've been blessed with the opportunities to meet Halo community leaders, interview developers and contributors to the Halo franchise, and most importantly, meet fellow Halo fans from around the world.  After being awarded the Best Gaming Podcast by the Podcast Awards in 2006, more than 5.5 million podcast downloads and being invited to speak on the Halo Community panel at Halo Fest, I've been inspired to continue the legacy and provide the best Halo podcast experience.

Halo community meetup in Seattle

While we know not everyone will have the opportunity to attend RTX this year, we still want you all, the Halo community to have the opportunity to celebrate with us.  Podtacular swag has only been available at conventions for the past couple years and t-shirts limited to community leaders, until now.  While this fundraising campaign is targeted towards supporting our reunion party, we're letting everyone in on the celebration with a chance to get your hands on some Podtacular goodness.

Our goal is to reach $5,000, which will help fund the reunion party and give us the ability to purchase swag for stream giveaways and this year's conventions we will be attending:

  • 100 Podtacular Lanyards
  • 200 Podtacular Wristbands
  • 400 Podtacular Buttons
  • 500 Podtacular Stickers
  • 20 Podtacular White T-Shirts

Meeting our fundraising goal will make way for us to put on our reunion party, but we don't just want any party, we want a party truly worthy to be classified as the best Halo party the community can bring.  If we raise more than our funding goal, we can bring the game to the party with us and provide more ways to share and grow Podtacular.  Additional funding will go towards:
  • Halo playable at the reunion party
  • More Podtacular swag: shirts, lanyards, etc.
  • New swag with popular Podtacular catch phrases and sayings
  • The ability to start our own store
  • Host Halo tournaments with cash prizes and Halo merchandise

We have many ideas at Podtacular of things we want to do for our fans and this is one of many.  Fellow Halo communities have been wonderful to make friends and work with and, along with our community, have established what we believe is one of the best gaming franchise communities out there.  As part of that community, we believe this opportunity will be one for Halo fans to come together and have a great time with fellow community members.

"But how can I help out," you ask?  Here's how:

Supporter Perk

For $5, your name will forever go down in Podtacular history as supporting the longest running Halo podcast and one of the best parties ever!  You'll receive a shoutout on our podcast and our reunion party live stream, and a "Thank You" tweet from us, telling the world that you are the best Halo community member out there.

Grab Bag Perk

For $30, you're more than just a supporter, you're a fan and one who deserves their own collection of Podtacular swag to show off to all your Halo friends.  Don yourself with a Podtacular lanyard, wristband, button, and sticker and show that you support the best Halo podcast on the planet.  In addition to receiving the Supporter perks, your choice of proper name or gamertag will be printed on our supporter banner that will be on display at our panel and the party, and included in our anniversary "Thank You" video that will be played during our panel and on our live stream during the party.

Swag Bag Perk

For $50, you want all the swag, including the coveted Podtacular white t-shirt seen by many, worn by few.  You'll get everything from the Grab Bag perk: lanyard, wristband, button, sticker, name on banner and video, and the Supporter perk, but you'll finally claim a Podtacular t-shirt as your own.  Remember to send us a picture with you in your shirt and we'll be sure to show our fans that you're a true fan.

Party Up Perk

For $77, you mean business and you want to take part in the fun at RTX.  In addition to everything the Swag Bag, you'll receive a VIP invite to our reunion party.  Celebrate with the founder and some of the original Podtacular staff and other Halo community members as we reminisce on past Halo experiences and toast to the future of the franchise and community.  You'll also get reserved seating at the front our anniversary panel, with the ability to participate in some fun activities and giveaway opportunities.  Because of the limited space at the venue for the reunion party, this perk is limited to the first 25 people.

Guest Host Perk

For $117, you deserve some time in the spotlight.  In addition to the Party Up perk, you'll get to guest host an episode of our podcast and choose the topic of discussion for that show.  This perk is limited to the first 7 people.

Ultimate Fan Perk

For $250, we cannot thank you enough.  You get everything, guest host, VIP pass and panel seating, swag and shoutouts along with your own blue, Podtacular themed controller.  This controller will be one of a kind, themed blue with the Podtacular logo and personalized with your gamertag. This perk is limited to the first 3 people.

We've already received support from 343 Industries who has graciously supplied us with some wonderful Halo goodies for us to give out during our panel, at the party and on our live streams.

Risks & Challenges

Podtacular has relied on the support from the Halo community since day one and while we've been through our ups and downs, we're confident in reaching our goal.  Even in the case that we don't meet our funding goals, we still greatly appreciate everyone's support and look forward in celebrating this special occasion the best we can.

Other Ways to Get Involved

If you're not able to contribute, all we ask is that you spread the word to family, friends and colleagues.  If you're going to be at RTX this summer, we also ask you come check out our panel where we'll be reliving some of our favorite Halo and Podtacular memories along with giving away some Halo swag courtesy of 343 Industries.

story:
Second Downtown

Before World War II, Olneyville Square was Providence's "second downtown." All that changed with the 6/10 Connector, which disconnected neighborhoods and pushed Olneyville into decline.

It's time to make Olneyville "second downtown" again.

We Need Your Support

  • In order to hold RIDOT accountable, we are organizing our own studies of this corridor, including vehicle counts. We are also bringing experts to speak to the community about experiences with highway-to-boulevard conversions in other cities, and organizing events like "a funeral for the 6/10 Connector" to bring community voices together for a different future.
  • Your contribution helps us to book venues, buy materials, pay for speakers, and carry on our work.

An Example

Seoul, South Korea removed one of its highways, replacing it mostly with a river park, and narrow roads on either side.

  • The urban heat island effect was cut in the area around the removed highway.
  • In the first year, transit ridership went up 15%.
  • Biodiversity along the area increased six-fold.
  • Over 60,000 people visit the site daily, 2,000 from foreign countries, and these combined visits account for billions of dollars of revenue for the area.
  • Land prices and employment rates rose faster near the highway than in the surrounding area.
We can have this in Providence too.
Halfway There, But So Much Further to Go

RIDOT has agreed that a raised highway will not work, so we've won the first part of our campaign after just a few meetings.

  • There's a big difference between a "boulevard" that is built to be a traffic sewer, and one that is built to be a multi-modal meeting place for businesses, residents, and visitors. 
  • Our goal is to be a strong proponent of the latter type of boulevard. Providence already moved a rail line and a river to create Waterplace Park. It's time to complete West Side Waterplace.

Other Ways Your Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • We need people to invite their friends, family, and neighbors to participate in the effort to make a 6/10 Boulevard happen.
  • As we put together events and do traffic counts, there are going to be huge opportunities to volunteer, and we need all the help we can get.

Thank you so much for your time and consideration.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Ever felt like a good cause or product never got the chance or want to see your donation in action?  Want to feel as a part of real power?

What if everyone donated just 1$?

_____________________________________________________________________________

10 AMAZING PROJECTS


         


      


      



DETAILS OF PROJECTS ARE HERE


COMPETING FOR YOUR  1$ AND VOTES

So we have created this idea, which turns crowdfunding on it’s head and empowers you to help the good ideas even more, with less of your own money. Here’s how it works. We’re starting on 14th of September this year on Indiegogo. You donate just 1$ to #onemillionyou campaign. After 44 days, campaign finishes and we hope, that together we will have reached 1M USD. 
And here comes the action.
Now, if you’ve donated, you have to vote. Vote for the project you like the most, or the one that you think, will change the world or make people’s lives better. It’s your choice. You will be able to wote 10 times per day for 10 days and choose from any category you like. We, at #onemillionyou team, at the time, will also pick our winner of all the campaigns posted on Indiegogo. Then we will split the funds in half. 50% goes to the winner, that you have voted. 50% goes to the winner, we have picked. 
It’s that simple.

___________________________________________________

TIMELINE

___________________________________________________


YOUR TEAM

We love things that excite, that are unique and make people happy. That's the way forward.


___________________________________________________

We also visited Maastricht in Netherlands to question people about crowdfunding and #onemillionyou idea. See how that turned out!


___________________________________________________

QUESTIONS & ANSWERS

Super detailed information about campaign and projects involved, available @ onemillionyou.com

___________________________________________________

story:
Introduction

My name is Ella, I am a 2nd grader in Boise, ID and I would like to ask for your help with my mission of placing a homeless family into a home.

This last winter, while driving to school, I noticed a stroller among the belongings of a homeless individual. It was a very cold morning and the thought of a small child not having a warm safe place to take shelter in and call home really struck me. After driving by the same area several days in a row, I decided I needed to do something to help. I created a flyer during free time in school and began asking my classmates to help me gather money to buy the homeless child a house. I quickly learned that perhaps there were better ways to help displaced families, which made more sense and were more attainable than purchasing a house. After returning the money I had collected from a couple of students, I asked for help from my mother to find the resources to pursue my dream.

I discovered the CATCH program in Boise. CATCH (Charitable Assistance To Community’s Homeless), is a nonprofit, 501(c)(3) organization committed to re-housing and serving homeless families with children. My mother and I met with the director of CATCH and discussed the many ways that we can help the homeless community as individuals. After the meeting with CATCH, I have decided to resume my efforts to make a home possible for a family that has no place to go.

I have decided to make it my mission to raise $3,900 for the CATCH program which pays for a family with children to be rent-free for six months while working with the CATCH staff to address the root causes of their homelessness. The CATCH program places approximately 100 families a year, and they currently have an extensive wait-list that is 8 months out.

I need your help. I have started the donations by putting in the money that I collected from Easter eggs this last holiday, please join me in my grassroots attempt to help the community and take one more family off of the streets.

How you can help

Every dollar counts. I am starting off the campaign by donating money that I saved from and Easter egg hunt, others are contributing spare change. As I mentioned above, my mother and I are working to find businesses in the community to match donations, we will keep you updated on this process.

The Impact

By raising the targeted amount, we will be able to take one more family off the CATCH program wait-list. With only $3,900, CATCH will be able to assist a family with placement into a safe home, and support them for 6 months with rental assistance, and extensive case management to address the root causes of the family's homelessness.

The families that CATCH serves have experienced a series of hard blows that have put them in a position of helplessness, homelessness, and hopelessness. We all know that when it rains it pours, but when it starts pouring and you have no where to go, the hits can be devastating, traumatizing, and even life threatening. After taking hit after hit, these families are in desperate need of a break, one chance to be able to change the momentum of their lives and move toward a safe, stable and nourishing environment for everyone to grow in. We all deserve that chance, and CATCH can give one more family that chance, with our help.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this campaign.

Check out www.catchprogram.org for other ways to get involved.

Be kind to your fellow beings, you never know what someone is going through.

We all deserve that chance, and CATCH can give one more family that chance, with our help.

    Other Ways You Can Help Share this campaign.
Check out www.catchprogram.org for other ways to get involved.
Be kind to your fellow beings, you never know what someone is going through.

story:
Our most available natural energy is the wind
I have discovered an efficient system to extract it

1st Generation 12 Meter McCanney WING GENERATOR

WE NEED A WORLD GREEN ENERGY SOLUTION

Current wind energy designs are flawed. My invention, the McCanney Wing Generator, efficiently captures wind energy unlike any wind generator on the market today. By efficiently capturing wind energy, the McCanney Wing Generator has the potential to make wind energy production the most cost efficient energy production method in the world.  And it works 24 hours a day in all parts of the world ... day and night come rain or come shine.

Most green advocates do not understand that "alternative energy" as implemented today is in the best interests of BIG CENTRALIZED ENERGY.  It guarantees that we will NEVER be able to replace gasoline alcohol autos with purely electrical vehicles.  Simply put .. the electrical companies cannot produce and deliver enough electrical energy to replace gasoline.  SO WE ARE STUCK ... RIGHT ? ... WRONG !

Let’s face it, the problem with green energy is that it costs more to produce than coal and nuclear power. Worse yet, power companies don’t have a strong incentive to produce power using renewable energy sources. The world needs a green energy solution that is cheaper than traditional power.

Based on preliminary calculations, the McCanney Wing Generator will produce energy more efficiently than coal or nuclear power production, not to mention the environmental solution. By increasing the number of blades, utilizing large surface airfoil WINGs that work in the direction of rotation, by reducing weight and gearing the turbine to turn very slowly, the McCanney Wing Generator efficiently captures wind energy from the entire area of its blades. Because the McCanney Wing Generator captures more wind, it is able to produce more energy. It is that simple! We are committed to making wind energy a total energy source. Additionally, because it spins slowly, it can scale up to extremely large sizes and power ratings comparable to those of nuclear and coal fired power plants. 

The McCanney Wing Generator has several applications.  The 12 Meter generators will be used to directly power ranches, large farms, factories and small communities such as eco-villages. Larger generators will be used to power towns and cities. Even larger generators will someday replace nuclear power plants! They can be used to directly pump water, run desalinization plants, power ocean going vessels or compress air storage without conversion to electricity.  The scope and application of this technology is seemingly limitless.

Please donate today to help the McCanney Wing Generator get off the ground. If everyone who visited this page gave $20, we would reach our goal! Your donation will directly fund the final prototype and commercialization on a large scale.  Developer Licenses are also available in the options below for individuals and corporations.

My name is James M. McCanney, M.S. Physics and I have developed a new highly efficient WING energy system that is scalable to extremely large sizes.  I use the term WING instead of wind to separate it from the low energy systems that people normally associate with alternative wind energy.  My quest started long ago as I was contracted by energy companies to do an end to end analysis of their power distribution efficiencies and losses.  They also included a request for analysis of the upcoming "alternative energy" industry.  What I discovered horrified me.  None of the alternative energy solutions would ever solve the world's energy needs.  They were being built and marketed by the same companies that had large financial interests in COAL NUCLEAR AND BIG OIL.  These were only meant to stay off the Greenies ... the tree huggers ... into thinking there would be a future when in reality they would never replace the central big three energy sources.  Burning high energy content fuels was here to stay ... forever.

So i started designing from the bottom up.  I analyzed solar and wind and discovered that WIND is the only true source for world energy complete independence (solar will only be a partial band aid).  For every location on the planet at all times of day and night and all year long.  I then started to write what is known in engineering circles as a "Functional Specification".  This is a set of design parameters that the final design must meet and also included all the bad things about current designs that had to be eliminated in my new design.  My WING system is the result of years of behind the scenes theoretical analysis and testing.  This resulted in my publication of this and related material in my September 2014 released eBook "McCanney WING GENERATOR - WORLD ENERGY PROJECT" (front and rear cover at the bottom of this page) which you will receive as a bonus for any donations over $100 to this campaign. 

I use the term "WING GENERATOR"  to distinguish from past generation "wind generators".  I have also coined the term "REPLACEMENT ENERGY"  instead of "alternative energy" because my system will REPLACE centralized power and allow people to cut the cord whereas alternative energy is just that ... an add on band aid that will never solve the world energy problem.

Wind is the most abundant and available energy source on earth.  It blows day and night in all places of the globe.  Come rain or come shine or night time and even at the north and south poles ... the wind keeps blowing.  The large 1000 foot engineering designs have been simulated and tested by a world class engineering company.  The diagram below shows the scaled WING systems from 100' tall ... to the 1000' tall design capable of replacing two 500 MegaWatt nuclear power plants. 

But we have to walk before we can run.  The current crowd funding project is to build and bring to market what I call the "12 meter WING GENERATOR" (39 foot diameter model) capable of powering a small village, a large ranch or major farm ... or any remote facility.   We have MANY targeted locations around the globe who will purchase these today.  The 12 METER model has been carefully chosen to meet the widest market segment world-wide.

if you are in a hurry scroll up to contribute -->

if not continue reading for a few minutes more !

RELIABILITY - The design is very simple with NO MOVING PARTS except for bearings (the same principle that makes jet engines so reliable). 

LONGEVITY - This system is designed for the long term.  Unlike old generation 3 blade wind generators which are constantly breaking down these systems are designed to be running in 100 or 200 years with minimal maintenance.

SIMPLICITY - Unlike prior generation wind generators, the WING system has all assembly, maintenance and heavy equipment ON THE GROUND. 

EFFICIENCY - The WING systems work efficiently AT LOW WIND SPEEDS unlike predecessors which only run at 10% efficiency even at mid wind speeds.  The WING systems are designed to extract energy at all wind speeds ... they do not need a separate motor to get them started and they operate at high wind speeds without any vibration.

ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY - The design principle is that they move very slowly and therefore do not kill bats or birds.  They do not generate any high frequency noise. They are pleasing to the eye.  They are Eco-Friendly.  Your electric car is not "eco-friendly" if your electric source is coal or nuclear power.  WING powered compressed air and electric vehicles will bring in a new age of ecologically sound transportation.

LIGHT WEIGHT - The WING designs incorporate extremely strong light weight materials.  The large units weigh less than a single blade of a moderate sized 3 blade wind generator.

WORLD ENERGY SOLUTION - MOST OF ALL the larger systems will one day replace coal nuclear and hydrocarbon based fuels completely.  We can generate ALL ,... that's right ... 100% of our energy from one single source ... the wind ... but we will never do it with solar or the old 3 blade wind generators which have proven themselves to be a complete disaster.  At a generous 20% of stated power with the old 3 blade wind generators (1.5 MegaWatt towers) it would take 77,000,000 of them to approach our world energy needs.  Clearly that will never happen.  With just 3000 of my 1000' WING generators world wide we would replace ALL nuclear coal and oil  power sources including running electric trains buses and automobiles ... and at a cost both monetarily AND environmentally far far less than coal nuclear hydrocarbon based and even hydro based energy.  Two single large WING generators would produce the energy of the Hoover Dam and at far less cost (by the way the Hoover Dam is not producing any electricity at all now due to the California drought ... but the wind is still blowing like crazy there).

THE 12 METER WING GENERATOR - When you contribute to this fund you will be helping launch the first commercial WING product ... the 12 METER WING GENERATOR that will fulfill the market of remote towns or small island communities OR large ranches or farms of which there are 100s of thousands around the world.  So hopefully you can see the market potential.  These communities will then be able to "cut the cord" to the centralized power companies.  These are the communities who pay the most for electric service.  Are you starting to get the picture ???  Can you imagine how this will grow when you start seeing these remote communities operating pure electric cars and motor scooters on WING power, eliminating their dependency on imported hydrocarbon fuels?  This is going to happen.  Are you going to help?

WHAT WILL YOUR CONTRIBUTION DO ??? It will help me buy better materials and make a better product and produce more testing.  It will help reach out to more communities in our awareness and marketing and bring the 12 METER model to the world.  I WANT YOUR HELP ... NOT FOR ME ... FOR THE WORLD WHICH IS IN DESPERATE NEED OF A TRUE 100% ALTERNATIVE ENERGY SOLUTION.

HOW MUCH SHOULD YOU CONTRIBUTE ... I am asking EVERYONE to contribute at least $20 ... more if you can ... but EVERYONE please make a donation ... my goal is to completely replace ALL COAL NUCLEAR OIL based fuels and be completely WING independent ... I have a plan to do this ... your contribution will go to pure R&D and the end product.

HELP ME REALIZE MY DREAM ... IT IS YOUR DREAM TOO !!!

WHAT DO YOU GET ???

$5 to $45 - A GREAT BIG HUG AND THANK YOU !!

$50 - a printable POSTER and SCREEN SAVER  (the same photo engineering drawing you see on the cover of my eBook McCanney WING GENERATOR shown at the bottom of this page) ... emailed to your email address

$100 - free copy of my eBook McCanney WING GENERATOR - WORLD ENERGY PROJECT (front and rear cover shown at the bottom of this page) AND the PRINTABLE POWER AND SCREEN SAVER ... emailed to your email address

$1000 - everything included in the $100 above PLUS a free 1 liter travel water filter system from my line of water filters

$5000 - everything included in the $100 and $1000 offers above PLUS a full size stainless steel gravity water filter with my GF filter elements for kitchen and emergency

TO DONATE ... go to the top right and click on "Contribute Now" OR select a PERK donation with free gift (note you can also donate anonymously).

  

To purchase a WING GENERATOR ... OR to purchase a developer license proceed below.

-----------------------------------

$30,000 - PURCHASE of one 12 METER McCANNEY WING GENERATOR - DELIVERY by April 2016 first deliveries of the 12 METER McCANNEY WING GENERATOR (includes installation for a single user electric service on a platform provided by the customer per our specifications ... you will need a local electrician to connect to your electrical system ... shipping charges will be extra ... there will also be an installation crew travel fee outside the countries of USA and Canada ... make sure you have a good open area with good wind approach unobstructed by trees buildings, if in the USA check with local zoning and other regulations prior to purchasing a unit etc)

DEVELOPERS LICENSING AND ROYALTY FEES - The plan offers Licensing and Royalty fees for developers - from single user non-commercial to large scale commercial corporations.  The agreement is simple on the open architecture of the WING GENERATOR.  Purchase these licenses in the "PERKS" list (descriptions below).  We will contact you individually after your contribution.  The developer will use the eBook McCanney WING GENERATOR (included in the purchase) and develop their own designs and implementations.  This is an open architecture so no patents or trademarks are allowed.   Developers assume all risks associated with their developments.  No outside investment is allowed including government funding or subsidies - all developments and funding must occur within the licensed development organization.  Licensing for commercial sale is based on the total number of company employees (including sub-contractors and contractors).  Royalty fees 5% of all product revenue including product leases, sales and support maintenance contracts.  NOT FOR RESALE - Licenses, designs and subsequent revenue are not transferable and cannot be resold without prior written approval. 

$500 - Single Family home single user non-commercial (you do not plan to sell units or sell electricity - personal use only)

$2000 - Small business - Development for commercial use small business with less than 10 total employees (including sub-contractors and contractors). 

$20,000 - Mid size business - Development for commercial use mid size business with 11 to 30 total employees (including sub-contractors and contractors).  The PERK donation is $2000 we will contact you for the balance.

$200,000 - Large size business - Development for commercial resale mid size business with 31 to 100 total employees (including sub-contractors and contractors).  The PERK donation is $2000 we will contact you for the balance.

$2,000,000 -  $2,000,000 MINIMUM - For businesses larger than 100 total employees (including sub-contractors and contractors) make the PERK donation of $2000 and we will contact you for negotiated amount.


Other Ways You Can Help !!
  • get the word out and make some noise about my campaign
  • mouse copy the URL from this page and email to everyone - tweet or facebook
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

---------------------------------------------------------------

story:
Thank you for watching!

On behalf of the Agape Gospel Mission, Liberia, Inc. I am pleased to forward to you, for your kind assistance, a request for for support to Ebola-affected children and their family members. The recent incidence of the Ebola outbreak left in its wake a massive loss of lives and destitute orphans, widows and desolate families.

As a church, we have embarked on a post-Ebola recovery plan which aims to give support and care to those mostly-hit, the children. While the epidemic ravaged between March 2014 and February 2015, our church kept its doors and ministries open to offer counseling, psychological and humanitarian assistance to victims. There is currently no case of the virus, but the grave incidence of abandonment, lack of opportunities for feeding, schooling, shelter, acceptance continues to plaque these kids.

We have written to partner with kind-hearted individuals like yourself to lend a support to our cause and increase our capacity to offer the needed assistance and meaning to the lives of these young ones.

Thank you so much for your considerations. 

Sincerely

J Mike David

FOR THE MEDIA AND SECRETARIAT

AGAPE GOSPEL MISSION LIBERIA, INC.

story:
The goal of this campaign is simple: to ensure that Tacoma government more equally reflects its population. The chance to be equally represented relies on putting forward candidates who understand the community's needs at all levels. While it's fair to say that political races are weighted in favor of those with the most funds, I was shocked that a city with a population of over 200,000 citizens could have any electoral campaign where candidates run unopposed. Even the basic filing fees for office (before taking into consideration the costs of a typical campaign) limit who runs for public office to those with access to economic power. If key segments of our population are unable to participate in the elections as candidates, there is very little chance for fair representation.

18% of Tacoma's residents live below the poverty level (http://quickfacts.census.gov/qfd/states/53/5370...). Decision makers who approve fines or rate increases for basic services typically do not see the impact first-hand of what happens to those unable to pay; how law-abiding citizens can be made criminal just in the process of trying to survive on less than living wages.

Our community's caretakers face the brunt of this economic reality. Lower wages for the same work (http://www.bls.gov/news.release/pdf/wkyeng.pdf) coupled with the high costs of childcare have forced many qualified women candidates to leave the work force. Despite the fact that the majority of degrees are conferred on women each year (http://nces.ed.gov/fastfacts/display.asp?id=72), the percentage of women in leadership roles in the corporate and government sectors is still not equal to men (https://www.americanprogress.org/…/fact-sheet-t...). As a result of missed career opportunities and the ability to build up retirement funds, women are twice as likely as men to live in poverty as senior citizens (http://www.nsclc.org/…/NSCLC-Senate-Aging-State...).

How do we create a city government that meets the needs of those without a voice? We need to work to remove barriers to participation in public life. We need public transportation that meets the needs of low-income workers (who are often forced to work shifts which do not align with public services), sick leave and protections for pregnant workers, effective measures to stop discrimination, and initiatives to improve educational resources across the city. We need to stop punishing those with the least resources by sending unpaid court fees to private collections agencies, and create realistic ways that offenders can pay off their debts. We need to protect the environment for those who can least afford the health risks associated with pollution. And we need to level the political playing field. This means that elections should better represent our community.

I want what's best for Tacoma. I also want to run a campaign that does not depend on large donations to create a carefully polished message. I want to authentically represent those who have up until now been unable to represent themselves.


Our campaign team members are more for raising up the people than raising funds. Having said that, we do need to be able to print materials for doorbelling and make signs. Funds raised in the course of this Indiegogo campaign will help us run a lean, grassroots campaign focused on bringing social justice issues to the foreground.

Your $1 contribution is a statement. One person alone can't make a difference, but together, we can change the landscape of Tacoma. Donate a dollar today and tell your friends why you support Suzanne's run for City Council.
We understand this isn't a traditional campaign, but Tacoma isn't a traditional town.

We've got grit: the determination to keep working no matter the odds.
Tell us what you love about Tacoma and what you would like to make better. Tell your friends. And let's work together to make our vision a reality.

Thank you,

Suzanne Skaar

Candidate for Tacoma City Council Position 7

basic filing fees for office (before taking into consideration the costs
 of a typical campaign) limit who runs for public office to those with 
access to economic power. If key segments of our population are unable 
to participate in the elections as candidates, there is very little 
chance for fair representation.  
18% of Tacoma's 
residents live below the poverty level 
(http://quickfacts.census.gov/qfd/states/53/5370...). Decision 
makers who approve fines or rate increases for basic services typically 
do not see the impact first-hand of what happens to those unable to pay;
 how law-abiding citizens can be made criminal just in the process of 
trying to survive on less than living wages.  
Our 
community's caretakers face the brunt of this economic reality. Lower 
wages for the same work (http://www.bls.gov/news.release/pdf/wkyeng.pdf)
 coupled with the high costs of childcare have forced many qualified 
women candidates to leave the work force. Despite the fact that the 
majority of degrees are conferred on women each year 
(http://nces.ed.gov/fastfacts/display.asp?id=72), the percentage of 
women in leadership roles in the corporate and government sectors is 
still not equal to men 
(https://www.americanprogress.org/…/fact-sheet-t...). As a 
result of missed career opportunities and the ability to build up 
retirement funds, women are twice as likely as men to live in poverty as
 senior citizens 
(http://www.nsclc.org/…/NSCLC-Senate-Aging-State...). 
How
 do we create a city government that meets the needs of those without a 
voice? We need to work to remove barriers to participation in public 
life. We need public transportation that meets the needs of low-income 
workers (who are often forced to work shifts which do not align with 
public services), sick leave and protections for pregnant workers, 
effective measures to stop discrimination, and initiatives to improve 
educational resources across the city. We need to stop punishing those 
with the least resources by sending unpaid court fees to private 
collections agencies, and create realistic ways that offenders can pay 
off their debts. We need to protect the environment for those who can 
least afford the health risks associated with pollution. And we need to 
level the political playing field. This means that elections should 
better represent our community. 
I want what's best for 
Tacoma. I also want to run a campaign that does not depend on large 
donations to create a carefully polished message.  I want to 
authentically represent those who have up until now been unable to 
represent themselves. 
Our campaign team members are more for raising up the people than raising funds. Having said that, we do need to be able to print materials for doorbelling and make signs. Funds raised in the course of this Indiegogo campaign will help us run a lean, grassroots campaign focused on bringing social justice issues to the foreground. 
 Your $1 contribution is a statement. One person alone can't make a difference, but together, we can change the landscape of Tacoma. Donate a dollar today and tell your friends why you support Suzanne's run for City Council. We understand this isn't a traditional campaign, but Tacoma isn't a traditional town.We've got grit: the determination to keep working no matter the odds.
Tell us what you love about Tacoma and what you would like to make better. Tell your friends. And let's work together to make our vision a reality.Thank you,Suzanne Skaar Candidate for Tacoma City Council Position 7

story: We are in need of financial support to continue to help these precious children heal with horses!  We need horse feed, hay, vet services, farrier services, a larger trailer, a new round pen, and running expenses.  We have 14 horses, a pony, a miniature donkey, a donkey, and a mule that are loved by all of our kids of which we serve over a hundred.  Thank you for any donation to our work.

story:
Cyclone Komen has ravaged Myanmar leaving 110,000 displaced, villages destroyed and a wake of terror. 

Base on the recent news from OCHA, between 67,000 and 110,000 people were severely affected by flood in Burma. The recent floods in Myanmar has affected 11 out of 14 regions in Myanmar. With no hope of rebuilding their lives till the storm abates. Houses, schools and hospitals were all washed way into the torrential rains and deadly landslides. There is no food, no water and little shelter. Whole villages have sunk in the rain and flood. And transportation has been greatly limited by the destruction of train lines. The disaster hasn't ended yet though. This is just the beginning of months of monsoon rains.Many people, organizations and foundations from inside and outside of our country has been helping, yet, they are needing more help since the flooding has not been stopped and rainfall is predicted to be heavy.

We have started this page to get international attention on flood victims in Myanmar. Myanmar now needs both financial and professional help.

With your help, they will have a much better chance at surviving this ordeal. Please lend them a hand, so they can be resilient, live through this, and eventually get back on their feet.

Individually we each can't do  much, but collectively we can certainly make a huge difference.

We have started a campaign on

http://igg.me/at/savemyanmarfloodfor he flood victims of Myanmar. The money save from this campaign will go to following Relief Organizations.
1. Free Funeral Service Society (FFSS) of Mr Kyaw Thu

Website : http://ffssyangon.org/

2. Daw Khin Kyi Foundation ( Daw Aung San Su Kyi 's Charity)

Website : http://dawkhinkyifoundation.org

3. Redcross Myanmar
Myanmar Redcross Society

Contact
Wai M Naing
kalawmyae@gmail.com

Other Ways You Can Help

www.myanmarflood.info

story:
Short Summary

Hello, 3D Cake Galway It was created from a dream. A dream,  about creating cakes edible works of art for special occasions and  taste great. 3D Cake Galway is  currently a home-based operation. For the past few years it has been steadily growing in popularity, and has gained a very loyal clientele. It's been my dream for several years now to open my own bakery with delectable gourmet treats featuring wholesome ingredients with homemade taste because it's all prepared from scratch.  

YOUR HELP MEANS SO MUCH!!!

With your support I'll be able expand & open a custom cake shop to serve  the Galway area and later even further. I've leased a equipped kitchen, where now I making cakes and delicious desserts, because my home kitchen was small for the big volume of orders.I know based on my reputation, order requests, sales records, and fan base, that 3D Cake Galway has nowhere to go but up. 


But enough of crap, well most people don't really care, now to the point. :-))



The details of what the funding is for 

& What You Get: 

The funding I require to open a Cake shop is €30,000.  
This covers:
* Licenses & Fees - Building permits, inspections, plan reviews & licenses for the Township...
*Design & Construction - Plumbing &electrical work , water heater, ventilation  & finishes by licensed contractors & all insurance...
* Shop equipment - such as commercial fridge, refrigerated showcases, counters, tables, selling  desk, cash register, ...


Some of the Perks!


Postcard of Ireland theme with a personal thank you what you're amazing :-))


Boxes of traditional cookies, send anywhere in the world.


Fabulous Cupcake :-))

                                      


Birthday or Weding Cake

                     

                                         



Don't see a reward that suits your needs or want to invest directly? Reach out to Radka by emailing 3dcakegalway@gmail.com

I can begin to fulfill its obligations immediately, upon customer request. We'll need shipping information and for some rewards we'll need dates, or approximate dates, of when you'll want to receive your rewards. 


Risks & Challenges

Opening a new shop is always hard, nothing is impossible. We will post videos online for you to keep up with the progress.

By selecting a business that has already an established food location will bypass most of the red tape for getting permits.

There are always the possibility of delays with planning & construction which may impact how quickly I can get out your rewards. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, don't worry, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Share this campaign on social media Facebook & Google + & Twitter & youtube and keep sharing. 
  • Mention this campaign to friends and family. Word of mouth has gotten me this far, so I'm sure the goal will be met if enough people just hear about it. 
  • Help me distribute postcards to get the word out about my campaign and upcoming events.
  • Prayer works!  And I can use all that I can get to stay diligent and encouraged.

story:
Support Injured Heroes  

                          "The Walk of Britain"

          When Bob Woodruff, ABC’s newly appointed news anchor, was hit by a roadside bomb while covering the war in Iraq, his life changed in an instant.  Bob’s traumatic brain injury nearly killed him.  But his miraculous recovery, including surviving 36 days in a coma, inspired the creation of the Bob Woodruff Foundation. 

          The BWF is a non-profit charity that is  dedicated to ensuring injured service members and their families will have access to the highest levels of support and resources they deserve, for so long as they need it.   In short, the BWF wants to do its best to see that the wounded will thrive long after our they return home. To date, the BWF has invested over $28 million in 261 innovative and impactful programs benefiting nearly 2 million people in communities where veterans, their families and caregivers live and work. 

          Even with the BWF's efforts over the last ten years, as well as the contributions of numerous other veterans organizations, the continuing needs of our returning service members far outweigh the limited resources that are available.  Since September 11, 2001, 2.8 million American troops have been deployed to Iraq and Afghanistan.  About 1.5 million have returned and a million more are coming home.  That said, only 1% of all Americans serve in the military, yet nearly all of us benefit from their sacrifices.  

          The time is now for all Americans to salute and adequately thank those who have risked everything for us.  One way you can show your appreciation for our injured American service members is by supporting the Bob Woodruff Foundation's participation in the Walk of Britain, a  1,000 mile odyssey starting in Scotland and winding down through Wales and England, finishing at Buckingham Palace on November 1, 2015.  The ten-week event is being held by Walking With The Wounded and will cover many of the country's most challenging landscapes, as well as hearts of cities.  You can see a map of the route below.  

          A truly remarkable group of six wounded veterans -- four British and two American -- will participate in the entire expedition.  For example, the US Team, which is being sponsored by the BWF, is being anchored by former U.S. Marine Kirstie Ennis.  She performed duties as a helicopter door gunner and was severely wounded when her aircraft was shot down during her second deployment in Afghanistan.  Due to the crash, Sgt. Ennis sustained several severe injuries that include: full thickness facial trauma (leaving her face nearly unrecognizable with a hole where her jaw should be), damage to her cervical and lumbar spine, hearing impairment, bilateral shoulder trauma, traumatic brain injury, and left foot limb salvage.  Since being wounded, she has undergone 38 surgeries during the long recovery process (she is now a Team USA Paralympic snowboarder).  Like many wounded, she has also endured disheartening challenges beyond her physical injuries, including survivor's guilt and three recent suicides of friends suffering from post-traumatic stress disorder.  Of her fallen comrades, she says, "They never made it home, so I'm living, grieving, walking in their honor and in their memory."  Read her story here.


          In addition, to assist the Walk of Britain's fundraising and awareness efforts, the core team will be joined each week at different points during the journey by other wounded service personnel and celebrities, including Prince Harry, who is a leading patron of the event.   Beyond fundraising, the Prince, who recently retired from the British Army Air Corps as an Apache Air Commander, hopes that the expedition will remind people of “the determination and resolve of those who have served, and in particular those who have been injured or suffer hidden wounds.”     Of course, Bob Woodruff and others from the BWF will join the heroes and will be with them when they tackle Pen Y Fan in the Brecon Beacons, which is the highest peak in South Wales and is known for its use in British Special Forces selection.

Clockwise from top left: Prince Harry and Bob Woodruff; Kirstie Ennis, who has undergone 38 surgeries since her 2012 helicopter crash in Afghanistan; Andrew and Kirstie training for their journey; Hikers head across Mount Snowden, the highest mountain in Wales.


          There is no doubt that after the wounded return to the love and support of their families and communities, many will continue to struggle.  One of every 50 has sustained a physical combat injury;  one in five suffers from post-traumatic stress or traumatic brain injury.  And while the physical and hidden injuries are often debilitating on their own, they often lead to a cascade of other troubles -- unemployment, marital issues, substance abuse, homelessness and suicide.  Sadly, the number of service members who commit suicide currently outnumbers those killed in actual combat.

     Your financial support of the BWF in the Walk of Britain will help honor and assist members of the US Armed Forces who have been injured serving you.  By doing so, you will assist the BWF with its continuing mission of identifying and supporting the best of breed in terms of impactful programs that provide vital assistance to the wounded and their families as they reintegrate into civilian life.  There is no doubt that long after the wars have wound down and the wounded have returned home, they will continue to need our assistance.  

On their behalf, I thank you for your generosity and your prayers and good wishes.

Please remember, it's not about the war, it's about the warrior...


 

                       Sgt. Kirstie Ennis                               Capt. Andrew Bement

                                                       ********

Their foundation is the gold standard in our country right now...A foundation that we know when we give a dollar, we know it's going to be well spent. And led by Bob and Lee Woodruff – in America there is no more dedicated couple to our men and women who served than the Woodruffs.

Admiral Mullen, USN (Ret.), 17th Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff

To build on PepsiCo’s longstanding commitment to veterans, we looked to the Bob Woodruff Foundation — the most trusted and respected veterans organization in the country.

Indra K. Nooyi, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of PepsiCo, Inc

The Bob Woodruff Foundation is helping us give veterans a new sense of mission and the satisfaction and self worth that comes from contributing to their communities in a meaningful way. 

Jacob Wood, CEO and Founder, Team Rubicon

Through their work, the Bob Woodruff Foundation is tackling the many risk factors (unemployment, educational and business failure, depression, troubled personal relationships and more) that can lead to a cascade of larger social problems like substance abuse, homelessness and suicide for veterans

Tori Lyon, Executive Director, Jericho Project

When the Bob Woodruff Foundation convenes a group of thought leaders, you want to be there. They have the kind of relationships to get the right people in the room. 

Michael Haynie, Ph.D., Founder & Executive Director, Institute for Veterans and Military Families


See the route:

story:
UPDATE! 

A huge THANK YOU to all who have contributed so far! We are in the home stretch, but, need your help to reach our goal. I've added a couple new perks that are extra SWEET!   Please share this link with all who would be sorry to miss this opportunity to support a growing Maui business and snag a sweet treat in the process!                                                                                                                                                 We're about...Old Fashioned Goodness

Maui Sweet Cakes is a local, artisanal bakery, offering a tasty line of beautifully packaged Shortbread Cookies, Sprinkle Cookies, and Brownies! Our sweets are made by hand, with love, and available through local Maui retailers.

A Little About Me...

Hi, I am Heidi,

I first fell in love with creating food, along side my mother and paternal grandmother. I loved being around the tastes and smells of their kitchens. Their legacy of creating food with love, that made people happy, left an indelible impression, and, inspires me still. In fact, one of my most treasured possessions is a hand written notebook of recipes from my Mom, which she began creating in the 60's.

Maui Sweet Cakes was born out of my evolution as a Pastry Chef, which began when I first moved to Hawaii, Lanai to be exact, in 1994. It was on a fluke and was only to be temporary.  As soon as I landed on Lanai I immediately fell in love! The beauty of the environment, the lifestyle, the beach, and, the clear, warm water. After my time on Lanai, I moved to Maui, where I continued to hone my craft and in 2001, I opened my first bakery,  Cakewalk Bakery, in Paia. At Cakewalk, I offered my customers my favorite sweets, all hand-made from scratch daily. Many of these sweets still have a following today, (and one popular item is available as a perk)!

2010 brought about a sale of Cakewalk Bakery and a new direction.  Maui Sweet Cakes was born, specializing in wedding cakes. Still, my heart kept returning to the  joy of bringing smiles with small sweets, so,  in 2014 I decided to add a line of packaged cookies, one based on an old favorite from my childhood-Shortbread! They are buttery, flaky, and not too sweet. I started selling them to local retailers, and, they have been wildly popular ever since! I added to the excitement with my Sprinkle Cookies, large shortbread cookies covered edge to edge in colorful sprinkles, and Swirl Brownies, for those who want something more decadent!

The next step...

Since expanding the line, the response has been phenomenal! These sweets are flying out the door at local retailers, and now I'm in the fortunate position of having to take a business leap to continue to meet rising demand. Our treats are loved by local residents and visitors alike. While there are cookie competitors from other islands, it's time for a Maui option. I often hear from folks that found our goodies while visiting Maui and are thrilled to be able to take home a little taste of their tropical holiday.

This campaign will help us meet our growing demand and market our products both on Maui and beyond.  I've always felt proud to be able to give back to the community that has helped me live my passion, as a local business owner.  Maui Sweet Cakes is a product that will add to Maui's growing reputation for quality, locally produced and beautifully packaged products that represent our pride of place. 

Your contributions will enable me to expand Maui Sweet Cakes in the following ways:

* Hire more cookie ninjas! (i.e. expand our staff)

* Purchase needed kitchen equipment 

* Invest in professional-quality marketing materials and photography

* Conquer the WORLD-wide web by completing our e-commerce website

Long Term Investment Opportunity

If you share my vision for expansion and the belief that Maui-made products have an enthusiastic and growing following, I would welcome investment support to realize Maui Sweet Cakes full potential.  If you, or someone you know is interested, please contact me personally at:  cakemaui@gmail.com.

Mahalo Nui (Many thanks)!

I appreciate your support and have some super sweet perks to offer in exchange. At just about every level, you'll find something here to sweeten-up your day—and your contribution will certainly make mine! Want to pay your perk forward? Yes, absolutely!

Another way to show your support is by sharing this campaign with your family, friends, and social networks using the provided links.

It takes a village to raise a bakery. With your help, I'm thrilled to be acting on Maui Sweet Cakes' potential and building a thriving local business who supports it's team members and community. Help me spread the Maui sweets!

Heidi-Sweet Creator & Simon-Pup Extraordinaire
story_txt:
UPDATE!  

A huge THANK YOU to all who have contributed so far! We are in the home stretch, but, need your help to reach our goal. I've added a couple new perks that are extra SWEET!   Please share this link with all who would be sorry to miss this opportunity to support a growing Maui business and snag a sweet treat in the process!                                                                                                                                                 We're about...Old Fashioned Goodness

Maui Sweet Cakes is a local, artisanal bakery, offering a tasty line of beautifully packaged Shortbread Cookies, Sprinkle Cookies, and Brownies! Our sweets are made by hand, with love, and available through local Maui retailers.





A Little About Me...

Hi, I am Heidi,
I first fell in love with creating food, along side my 
mother and paternal grandmother. I loved being around the tastes and smells of their kitchens. Their legacy of creating food with love, that made people happy, left an indelible impression, and, inspires me still. In fact, 
one of my most treasured possessions is a hand written notebook of 
recipes from my Mom, which she began creating in the 60's. 



  Maui Sweet Cakes was born out of my evolution as a Pastry Chef, which began when I first moved to Hawaii, Lanai to be exact, in 1994. It was on a fluke and was only to be temporary.  As soon as I landed on Lanai I immediately fell in love! The beauty of the environment, the lifestyle, the beach, and, the clear, warm water. After my time on Lanai, I moved to Maui, where I continued to hone my craft and in 2001, I opened my first bakery,  Cakewalk Bakery, in Paia. At Cakewalk, I offered my customers my favorite sweets, all hand-made from scratch daily. Many of these sweets still have a following today, (and one popular item is available as a perk)!




2010 brought about a sale of Cakewalk Bakery and a new direction.  Maui Sweet Cakes was born, specializing in wedding cakes. Still, my heart kept returning to the  joy of bringing smiles with small sweets, so,  in 2014 I decided to add a line of packaged cookies, one based on an old favorite from my childhood-Shortbread! They are buttery, flaky, and not too sweet. I started selling them to local retailers, and, they have been wildly popular ever since! I added to the excitement with my Sprinkle Cookies, large shortbread cookies covered edge to edge in colorful sprinkles, and Swirl Brownies, for those who want something more decadent!


The next step...
Since expanding the line, the response has been phenomenal! These sweets are flying out the door at local retailers, and now I'm in the fortunate position of having to take a business leap to continue to meet rising demand. Our treats are loved by local residents and visitors alike. While there are cookie competitors from other islands, it's time for a Maui option. I often hear from folks that found our goodies while visiting Maui and are thrilled to be able to take home a little taste of their tropical holiday.
This campaign will help us meet our growing demand and market our 
products both on Maui and beyond.  I've always felt proud to be able 
to give back to the community that has helped me live my passion, as a local business owner.  Maui Sweet Cakes is a product that
 will add to Maui's growing reputation for quality, locally produced and
 beautifully packaged products that represent our pride of place.  
Your contributions will enable me to expand Maui Sweet Cakes in the following ways:
* Hire more cookie ninjas! (i.e. expand our staff)
* Purchase needed kitchen equipment 
* Invest in professional-quality marketing materials and photography
* Conquer the WORLD-wide web by completing our e-commerce website 


Long Term Investment Opportunity
If you share my vision for expansion and the belief that Maui-made 
products have an enthusiastic and growing following, I would welcome 
investment support to realize Maui Sweet Cakes full potential.  If you, or someone you know is interested, please contact me personally at:  cakemaui@gmail.com. 

Mahalo Nui (Many thanks)!
I appreciate your support and have some super sweet perks to offer in exchange. At just about every level, you'll find something here to sweeten-up your day—and your contribution will certainly make mine! Want to pay your perk forward? Yes, absolutely! 
Another way to show your support is by sharing this campaign with your family, friends, and social networks using the provided links.
It takes a village to raise a bakery. With your help, I'm thrilled to be acting on Maui Sweet Cakes' potential and building a thriving local business who supports it's team members and community. Help me spread the Maui sweets!
Heidi-Sweet Creator & Simon-Pup Extraordinaire

story:
Our Story

My name is Georgia Lobban. I am a parent of Jamaican-Canadian origin. At the tender age of four, my daughter Zola began asking questions about her hair and skin color, as compared to characters she enjoys in books and on TV; characters that many of her friends look like. She expressed a clear desire to look like what she thought was more "normal' and "prettier". "It looks silly mommy" she says, describing her hair in it's curly natural state.  

I was raised among people that looked like me as well as many other ethnicities that united to create one culture - the Jamaican culture; a reflection of the motto "Out of Many One People." Despite this background, it wasn't until I started seeing the world through my daughters' eyes did I realize that I too was influenced by the lack of diverse characters in my world as a child. Because of this I began to recognize insecurities that followed me through adulthood. Now in my late 30s I've begun to embrace what I once thought made me different as what makes me a unique and a worthwhile contribution to society. 

In addition to being a mom I own and manage a successful hospitality sales and marketing consulting firm.  As a consultant, I have developed a keen eye for identifying problems and creating solutions to optimize performance. 

It is with these same eyes I've approached this situation, I've encountered with my daughter and what I later learned a problem that has become too common for comfort.

 After going to the library and other local stores, I was shocked that I couldn’t find any storybooks or dolls to give my daughter with pictures of girls that look like her. 

How many of us can relate to this story?

While sharing my story with a few friends, also with children of diverse descent, I was overwhelmed with the nods of agreement. They too struggle with finding images and messages that communicate to their children that they are beautiful exactly the way they are. It became clear in that moment: we need to do better for our children.

That's when Little Proud Kid was born.

WHAT IS LITTLE PROUD KID

Little Proud Kid is an all-inclusive online marketplace that provides minority parents with the resources they need to make their child proud to be as beautiful as they are. Through the resources and products offered on LPK’s site, parents will be able teach their child to embrace their beauty, instilling self-confidence and positive change. No matter their skin color, heritage, or hairstyle, through Little Proud Kid, parents can find storybooks, dolls, photo journals, gaming products, and parenting resources to allow their children to see past their differences and embrace their cultural and physical identity. 

THE PROBLEM

Today, minority children do not see themselves enough in the books they read, the films they watch, and the toys they play with. While there is a lot a enlightening material for majority children to learn from, there is little for minority children.

When a child does not see his or her self in the educational materials they are presented, they:

1. Don’t know that they are beautiful (despite what we tell them at home)

2. Feel ashamed of how they look

3. Strive to behave and be like those in the dominant group

4. Feel as though they have no power

5. Feel inferior

6.  Lose self-esteem

Because minority children do not see themselves in their books, films and toys, they often go through their young life struggling to measure up to standards that don’t apply to them. They see themselves as separate from the majority and without power.

With no widely known central place that specializes in minority products for children parents turn to outlets like Amazon. While Amazon offers a basic level of multi-cultural products, many great products do not make it to Amazon for many reasons. However, the biggest reason is that most sellers do not generate enough income from their book or toy on the platform, so they instead focus on offering their products privately.

Thus, most multi-cultural products get lost in the fray and are un-findable.  The result is that we spend endless time searching for appropriate products.

What We Need & What You Get

Phase 1: We're currently in phase 1, where we carefully curate appropriate products from major eCommerce retailers and house it on our marketplace to eliminate the search for diverse products.

Phase 2:  This is where we take Little Proud Kid to a level that allows us to impact the masses bring the changes we need to help all children see themselves represented in the world they live. Our funding goal of $25K will take us to this level. 

In this Phase we will partner with independent authors, illustrators, toy and film makers around the world who are limited in their distribution and mobilize through a more profitable and accessible business model. We will hand select quality products through wholesaling and make it available on our marketplace.

Our funding goal will cover a six month period of:

·  Wholesale and Packaging

·  Website enhancements

·  Marketing and branding

1st STRETCH GOAL

Phase 3: This is the level our first stretch goal of $35K will impact. In this phase we will begin to assess demand and identify gaps. 

To ensure availability of products that are effectively meeting the needs of diverse families and communities we will expand our wholesale and package products in high demand.

 And where we gaps we will develop products, such as, diverse books, greeting cards, animated films and merchandise to meet the ongoing needs of our communities. 

PERKS

Exclusive Little Proud Kid Founding Family Tee

Book: Island Kids Adventures - The Hurricane 

Island Kids Adventures, a book series for ages 5-8, featuring a diverse cast. A few perks include an opportunity for your child or family to be featured in one or more stories. 

Here's a sneak peak:

WHO DOES LPK SERVE?

Little Proud Kid’s primary focus is geared toward minority families with children in the most impressionable age ranges, from toddler to early teens.

Little Proud Kid is also for families that want to teach their children about different races and cultures. 

Families will not be the only ones to benefit from LPK. The authors, toy makers, film directors, and everyone else that make products for minority children need support. Their success means more toys, books and films made just for minority children. LPK gives them the opportunity to financially survive.

Our Supporters tell us why Little Proud Kid is important


THE IMPACT

It's Plain and simple: when kids do not see enough of themselves in the books they read, the toys they play with, or the films they watch, they lose self-esteem, self-confidence and their identity is obscured.

Our mission through our products is to make children proud to be as beautiful as they are, generate the ability to rise above any circumstance or story that might impact their ability to live their true purpose; and develop a culture of tolerance for differences. 

No longer will have to wait for big box retailers to agree that diverse characters and products for children needs to be the norm. 

How much time do you have to change the landscape of how minority children are viewed in the world - by themselves or others?

15 minutes

Review our campaign, Pick a perk, Leave us an encouraging comment,  share our campaign via social media 

10 minutes
Review our campaign  and pick a perk  
5 minutes
Pick a perk and support our campaign
<5 minutes
Leave us an encouraging comment and share our campaign via social media 
< 1 minute
Share our campaign via social media 

Whether your contribution is in the form of monetary funds, encouragement or simply spreading the word YOU are a great example of turning the lens inward and BEING THE CHANGE we need to see in this world.

story:
Summary

Growing up as a poor boy in the Tanzanian village of Mugeta, one of the most impoverished villages in eastern Africa, Joash Gambarage did not put on his first pair of shoes until the day he borrowed one from a boy in a well-off family, for his grade 7 graduation ceremony. Today, Gambarage is a PhD candidate at UBC’s Department of Linguistics. He has made a profound difference by founding a school that brings hope and educational opportunities to the lives of many poor children in Mugeta. How grateful Joash is for the UBC Four-year-fellowship doctoral award that gave him the opportunity to study in Canada! 

As he describes in the video, in spite of hundreds of children who live in Mugeta, the village had only one elementary school. Because many families live in a difficult environment, many kids drop out of school and beg for money and food in the streets. Gambarage sought a context which would make these poor children go back to school again; a context where children from impoverished families could access free nursery and elementary education and a free meal, and it is Mugeta Children's School (MUCS)  that provides such a context. 

MUCS is a community-based education project which has been supporting, educating and empowering boys and girls who would not otherwise have access to nursery and elementary school education since 2010. Through education Joash broke his vicious circle of poverty and we follow him in believing that education is the only tool that can provide opportunities for poor children to access resources to overcome their own difficulties and create their future lives. 

As part of that effort, our team is supporting this initiative by asking people to donate funds in order to address the water crisis in his school and community. The funds will also address urgent needs that will foster sustainability of the school and the greater Mugeta community. 

What is Needed

Despite the challenges, MUCS has already conquered numerous obstacles, and we are determined to keep the school on a self-sustaining path to success. We have three major needs:

(i) The well for the school and for the surrounding residents. 

Mugeta is located in a semi-arid climate and for that reason the school and the community lack safe and clean water. The school and the Mugeta community rely on water from hand-dug bore holes which are dirty and unsafe. The underground water surveyor's report done submitted this September (thanks to Hope for Happiness for paying CAD$950 for the hydrological survey) recommends that a 95m deep underground well is capable of providing up to 100,000 litres of fresh water per hour. This is exciting news! The cost of drilling and setting up the well (including the cost for a water pump and pipes) is 7.5 million Tanzanian Shillings (aprox. CAD$5000). We also need two giant plastic reservoir tanks each capable of carrying 10,000 litres. Transportation and installation of the tanks require approximately CAD$2000.  

The water project will provide: 

  • Safe and clean drinking water for the children and the surrounding Mugeta Community. This will prevent the current situation of kids suffering from cholera and other waterborne diseases because of using water from ponds and boreholes which are unsafe. It will also save women and children from walking long distances to bring a single bucket of hazardous-water.
  • The water project will also help to support the start-up of a sustainable community farm where children and the surrounding community can get affordable fresh vegetables, fruits and cereals. The farm will also provide a daily, nutritious breakfast and lunch for students. (For more information about Mugeta sustainable farm project click Hope for happiness page

(ii) Classroom buildings

As shown in the video, MUCS has two modern classrooms that are currently being used, but do not have a floor and are not plastered yet. The budget for putting on a floor, plastering and painting is 3 million TZS (approx. $CAD 2,000). Thus to have these two projects done, in addition to the well, we are looking to raise CAD$9000. 

Your donation at work

The great thing about this project is that 100% of the proceeds raised will go directly to the project! 

If we meet our fund-raising goal the implementation will start immediately. As soon as the respective project is done we will post an update on our website (www.mugetachildren.com) and on our Facebook page Facebook page. Feel free to contact us by email or phone (given in the school website) if you have any inquiries.

 If we raise more money than our goal, we will use the money to implement the long term goals, eg. we have 3 more classrooms to be finished (as shown in the video) and this is the last phase of classroom extension (Kindergarten and grade 6-7). We also need more playground facilities for children, a library, and a computer room.

Volunteer opportunities!

A couple of people have volunteered with MUCS in the past. There are two major ways to volunteer with the project. You can volunteer with Hope for Happiness who will be launching the sustainable farm project (this is subject to completion of the water project) or you can go help with the English language program at MUCS where you can engage students in the singing and recital program, daily conversation in English, teaching them some sports and games,  running children's summer camp etc. Volunteer opportunities will be launched officially in the summer of 2016. Write to us if you are interested and we will get back to you as soon as possible. Even if you want to say a day or two at MUCS then head to Kilimanjaro, Zanzibar or to the Serengeti for Safari, MUCS is more than happy to host you!

Thank you to everyone for your continued love and support!


Links: http://news.ubc.ca/2015/09/10/education-is-a-powerful-weapon-ubc-international-student-builds-school-fosters-hope-in-african-hometown/
