story:
We Need Your Help And Support

    We're not running this crowd funding campaign to start a brewery, we've already done that part... we're asking for your help and support so that we can build your taproom!   A rustic and refined setting where YOU and ALL craft beer lovers will feel comfortable and inspired to enjoy our flavorful, unique, and seasonal handcrafted ales. 

More About Us

   We are Carolina Bauernhaus Ales, a farmhouse brewery in Anderson South Carolina.  Our handcrafted ales pay homage to the rich agricultural resources and heritage of Upstate South Carolina by using locally sourced malt, grains, yeast, and hops. While our brewing techniques may be Belgian inspired, our handcrafted ales are by no means reverent to tradition.  Our mission is to not only create complex, exciting, and full flavored handcrafted ales, but also create a sense of community through craft brewing education, innovation, brewery collaborations, and activities/festivals.  Our family of unique handcrafted ales range from approachable saisons to bold IPA's and more challenging and complex barrel aged and fermented sours.

What We Will Use Your Crowd Funding Support On

   Our goal is to raise $25,000 through this crowd funding campaign to help offset the costs of constructing, building, and installing your taproom (e.g.: walk-in cooler,  serving bar, arm rail bar, tables,  stools, plumbing, floor drains, and a commercial grade dishwasher).  If we don't reach our entire crowd funding goal, any funds raised will be used to directly offset the costs of building your taproom. 

   Sure eventually we will have a taproom to replace that old jockey box and keezer, but with your help and support it can happen SO much faster!  Your support will help Carolina Bauernhaus Ales create  a taproom that reflects the character of the region, a rustic and refined setting where YOU and ALL craft beer lovers will feel comfortable and inspired to enjoy our flavorful, unique, and seasonal handcrafted ales. 

   Here are a couple pictures of our planned taproom serving bar, stools, and tables.  It's kinda hard to show good pictures of floor drains, plumbing,  and a walk-in cooler, but trust us, they aren't sexy BUT we have to have them:

 

What You Get For Your Crowd Funding Support

   In exchange for your help and support through this crowd funding campaign we have created some great rewards! In addition, everyone that supports at ANY level will be immortalized on the taproom wall. 

   Here are some pictures of the rewards that we are offering for your financial help and support of Carolina Bauernhaus Ales:

  • Patches:

  • Fleece Jackets (in a variety of colors):

  • Custom Etched Crystal Flutes, Work Shirts, and Hats:

  • Custom Regional Wood Tasting Flight Paddles & Tasting Tulips:

  • Custom Bottle Opener:

  • Carolina Bauernhaus T-shirt:

  • Carolina Bauernhaus Mug Club:

  • Food Truck Rodeo:

PS, If you want a reward that we are not offering through this campaign, PLEASE let us know and we will try to provide it for you!  Odds are you have an excellent idea for a reward that other craft beer lovers may want as well!

Upcoming Tasting Events!
     Saturday, February 21st. Greenville Beer Week Bottle Share @ Thomas Creek Brewery. 5-7pm. Donations go towards promotion of Greenville Craft Beer Week. Greenville, SC

     Saturday, February 28th. Brewvival. We'll be helping pour samples of wild regional brews from across the state with SouthYeast Labs.
 
      Wednesday March 4th. Growler Haus Spartanburg. 6:30pm. With presentation to Upstate Brew Crew. Spartanburg, SC
  
     Thursday, March 12th. Greenville Beer Exchange. 5-7pm. Sample a collection of our regional and seasonal beers! Greenville, SC

     Saturday, March 28th All Ale To The Queen, Wrap up event for Charlotte Craft Beer Week. 1-9pm. Charlotte, NC


Transparency

   People value transparency, and so do we!  We want to be completely open and transparent in this crowd funding process...  SO, if you have any questions about ANYTHING please ask! 

Other Ways You Can Help

   Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help!  PLEASE help us get the word out and make some noise about this campaign!  You can help spread the word by mentioning this campaign on Facebook, by good old fashion word of mouth, and by using the Indiegogo share tools.

   We greatly appreciate your help and support and we look forward to serving you our flavorful, unique, and seasonal handcrafted ales in YOUR new rustic and refined taproom soon!

CHEERS
story_txt:
We Need Your Help And Support
    We're not running this crowd funding campaign to start a brewery, we've already done that part... we're asking for your help and support so that we can build your taproom!   A rustic and refined setting where YOU and ALL craft beer lovers will feel comfortable and inspired to enjoy our flavorful, unique, and seasonal handcrafted ales.  







More About Us


   We are Carolina Bauernhaus Ales, a farmhouse brewery in Anderson South Carolina.  Our handcrafted ales pay homage to the rich agricultural resources and heritage of Upstate South Carolina by using locally sourced malt, grains, yeast, and hops. While our brewing techniques may be Belgian inspired, our handcrafted ales are by no means reverent to tradition.  Our mission is to not only create complex, exciting, and full flavored handcrafted ales, but also create a sense of community through craft brewing education, innovation, brewery collaborations, and activities/festivals.  Our family of unique handcrafted ales range from approachable saisons to bold IPA's and more challenging and complex barrel aged and fermented sours. 










What We Will Use Your Crowd Funding Support On

    Our goal is to raise $25,000 through this crowd funding campaign to help offset the costs of constructing, building, and installing your taproom (e.g.: walk-in cooler,  serving bar, arm rail bar, tables,  stools, plumbing, floor drains, and a commercial grade dishwasher).  If we don't reach our entire crowd funding goal, any funds raised will be used to directly offset the costs of building your taproom.    Sure eventually we will have a taproom to replace that old jockey box and keezer, but with your help and support it can happen SO much faster!  Your support will help Carolina Bauernhaus Ales create  a taproom that reflects the character of the region, a rustic and refined setting where YOU and ALL craft beer lovers will feel comfortable and inspired to enjoy our flavorful, unique, and seasonal handcrafted ales.     Here are a couple pictures of our planned taproom serving bar, stools, and tables.  It's kinda hard to show good pictures of floor drains, plumbing,  and a walk-in cooler, but trust us, they aren't sexy BUT we have to have them:  

What You Get For Your Crowd Funding Support   In exchange for your help and support through this crowd funding campaign we have created some great rewards! In addition, everyone that supports at ANY level will be immortalized on the taproom wall.    Here are some pictures of the rewards that we are offering for your financial help and support of Carolina Bauernhaus Ales:Patches:Fleece Jackets (in a variety of colors):Custom Etched Crystal Flutes, Work Shirts, and Hats:
Custom Regional Wood Tasting Flight Paddles & Tasting Tulips:

Custom Bottle Opener:

Carolina Bauernhaus T-shirt:Carolina Bauernhaus Mug Club:Food Truck Rodeo:
PS, If you want a reward that we are not offering through this campaign, PLEASE let us know and we will try to provide it for you!  Odds are you have an excellent idea for a reward that other craft beer lovers may want as well! 
 
Upcoming Tasting Events!     Saturday, February 21st. Greenville Beer Week Bottle Share @ Thomas Creek Brewery. 5-7pm. Donations go towards promotion of Greenville Craft Beer Week. Greenville, SC     Saturday, February 28th. Brewvival. We'll be helping pour samples of wild regional brews from across the state with SouthYeast Labs.        Wednesday March 4th. Growler Haus Spartanburg. 6:30pm. With presentation to Upstate Brew Crew. Spartanburg, SC        Thursday, March 12th. Greenville Beer Exchange. 5-7pm. Sample a collection of our regional and seasonal beers! Greenville, SC     Saturday, March 28th All Ale To The Queen, Wrap up event for Charlotte Craft Beer Week. 1-9pm. Charlotte, NCTransparency
    People value transparency, and so do we!  We want to be completely open and transparent in this crowd funding process...  SO, if you have any questions about ANYTHING please ask! Other Ways You Can Help    Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help!  PLEASE help us get the word out and make some noise about this campaign!  You can help spread the word by mentioning this campaign on Facebook, by good old fashion word of mouth, and by using the Indiegogo share tools.
    We greatly appreciate your help and support and we look forward to serving you our flavorful, unique, and seasonal handcrafted ales in YOUR new rustic and refined taproom soon!CHEERS

story:
Gründung eines Center of Self - Cultivation Arts

    

Establishment of a Center of Self-Cultivation Arts

 

Gestalte Dein Leben selbst!


Bei diesem Projekt geht es um die Gründung eines Zentrums für Selbst-Kultivierung. Selbst-Kultivierung ist ein Begriff aus dem Alten China der Chinesisch Xiulian heißt. Er beinhaltet vieles, was heute in Teilen des Qigongs enthalten ist, ebenso in den Chinesisch - philosophischen Schulen des Konfuzianismus, Daoismus, Buddhismus wie auch der Chinesischen Medizin. Genau genommen ist es eine der Grundlagen der Chinesischen Medizin an sich. Durch Xiulian lernen wir (wieder) unser Leben selbst zu gestalten!

Die Idee zur Gründung dieses Zentrums für Selbst-Kultivierungskünste basiert auf meinen Erfahrungen und dem erlernten Wissen aus den letzten 32 Jahren, in denen ich mich mit der chinesischen Kultur befasst habe, was insbesondere die Künste des Taijiquan, Shaolinquan, des Qigong, des Daoyin, der Chinesischen Medizin, der Teekultur, Daoismus, uvm. betrifft. Meine Erfahrungen aus rund 25 Jahren Unterrichtstätigkeit in diesen Künsten runden das Ganze weiter ab.


Create Your own life!

This project involves the establishment of a center for self-cultivation. Self-Cultivation which originates from Ancient China, named  Xiulian. It contains a lot of what we find today in different parts of Qigong and also in the three great Chinese philosophical schools of Confucianism, Taoism, Buddhism and in Chinese Medicine. In fact it is one of the foundations of Chinese Medicine in itself. Through Xiulian we are able to learn creating our own lives!

The idea of establishing this Center of Self Cultivation Arts is based on my very own experiences and acquired knowledge from the past 32 years, in which I have engaged myself in the Chinese culture. Especially in the arts of Taijiquan, Shaolinquan, Qigong, Daoyin, Chinese Medicine, Tea Culture, Daoism and many more. My experiences in teaching my knowledge of 25 years makes my qualification for this project complete.


Warum ist dies wichtig und für was wird gespendet?

Wissen und Übungsmethoden für Alle!

Ich möchte mit diesem Projekt einerseits, allen Interessierten einen Platz geben, um sich mit den Methoden und den Hintergründen der Selbst-Kultivierung beschäftigen zu können. Dies geschieht bspw. durch das Erlernen praktischer Übungen in der Art von bewegten Formen, meditativen Praktiken, Lesen relevanter Texte und Klassiker und Verinnerlichung dieser, und vielem mehr. Deren Umsetzung in den Alltag hat hierbei höchste Priorität.

Das Wissen hierzu stammt einerseits aus der Literatur der Chinesischen Medizin, Philosophie, Kampfkunst, etc. Zum Anderen wird es aus verschiedenen Linien bezogen in denen ich bisher lernen durfte und auch weiterhin lernen darf, (bspw. die Huatuomen Linie, die Mao Shan Linie der daoistischen Elixierschule, usw.) aus denen mir die Meister dieser Überlieferungstraditionen riesige Schätze Alten Wissens zur Verfügung stellen welche ich durch das Zentrum gerne mit anderen Menschen teilen möchte.

Why is this important and what is donated?

Knowledge and practice methods for All!

Through this project I want to give all interested parties an opportunity to get to know the methods and their settings of the Self Cultivation. You are able to achieve this by learning practical exercises in the way of moving forms, meditative practices, reading and internalizing relevant texts and classics. The highest priority is the implementation into everyday life.

The Knowledge of all these different aspects is based on studying Chinese Medicine, philosophy and martial arts literature. Recently my prospect expanded through my involvement in various lines, in which I was previously able to learn and still do (eg. the Huatuomen line, the Mao Shan line of Taoist Elixir school, etc.). My masters of this traditions make these huge treasures of old knowledge available and i would like  to share them with other people with the aid of the center.


Forscher und Meister

Zum Anderen möchte ich durch meine Kontakte zu Meistern, einiger sehr alter Praxislinien, die jeweiligen Traditionen in diesem Zentrum zusammen kommen lassen, um die Schätze der Alten chinesischen Kultur zu bergen und  allen Menschen zugänglich machen. Hierzu wird es im Zentrum einen eigenen Forschungsbereich geben, an dem weitere befreundete Sinologen, Mediziner, Meister und Großmeister zusammenarbeiten und entsprechende Ergebnisse bzw. Literatur in Zukunft veröffentlichen können.

Researchers and Master

Additionally I strive to bring together these particular traditions of this  center to unearth the tresasures of Ancient Chinese Culture and making this accessible to all people. My various contacts to masters of very old practice line will make me able to do so. For this purpose a research area will be established in the center where through the collaboration of several college sinologists, doctors, masters and grandmasters  results and outcomes will be published.


Wie sehen die weiteren Schritte aus?

1.  Schritt

Um das ganze auf eine sichere Grundlage stellen zu können bedarf es einer Firmengründung im Sinne einer Company bzw. Enterprise. Der Hauptsitz wird in Taiwan sein. Hierzu dient diese erste Kampagne. Sollte ein Überschuss aus dieser Kampagne bzgl. der finanziellen Mittel entstehen so können die weiteren Schritte schon früher begonnen werden.

2.  Schritt

Nach der Gründung werden Räume benötigt die entsprechend groß sind, um das ganze so zu realisieren, dass es möglich ist, Kurse und Retreats vor Ort abhalten zu können bzw. Reisen nach Taiwan zu ermöglichen, bei denen langfristig gesehen, auch Übernachtungen möglich sind. Räume werden benötigt für

-  Unterricht

-  Bewegungskünste wie Daoyin, Kampfkünste, etc.

-  Präventive Maßnahmen und Therapie (Aus- und Fortbildung)

-  Bibliothek (Sie soll alle relevanten Werke aus den letzten Jahrtausenden beherbergen soll. Besucher werden diese entsprechend nutzen können)

-  Büros

-  Falls möglich Gästezimmer, Küche und Mensa

Die Räumlichkeiten dienen in erster Linie zur Aus- und Fortbildung sowie der Forschung.

What are the next steps?

Step 1

In order to implement this idea we need to establish a company or enterprise. The headquarters are going to be in Taiwan. If there should a occur an excess out of this campaign in regards of financial sources perpetuating steps can be initiated.

Step 2

After the founding premises are needed which are sufficiently large in order to realize the whole so that it is possible to hold courses and retreats on site or to allow travel to Taiwan, which in the long run, even overnight stays are possible. Facilities are required for

- Teaching

- Movement arts like dao yin, martial arts, etc.

- Preventive measures and therapy (education and training)

- Library (you should all relevant works from the last thousands of years to house visitors will be able to use it accordingly.)

- Offices

- If possible, Living Room, Kitchen and Dining Hall

The premises are used primarily for training and research.



Angebote im Center

Neben dem Forschungsbereich im Center liegt der Schwerpunkt in der Aus- und Fortbildung.

Der Unterricht soll in Form von Wochenendkursen, Retreats, Urlaubs- und Intensivkursen, Privatstunden, präventiven Anwendungen, etc. geschehen. Dies kann auf dreierlei Art umgesetzt werden. Einerseits im Center in Taiwan durch Reisen hierher, andererseits durch Gastseminare in den jeweiligen Ländern und durch von uns ausgebildeten Personen in ihren Heimatländern vor Ort, sowie durch Online Unterricht. Je nach Art und Inhalt des jeweiligen Kurses kann dieser in Form von Modulen, Blöcken, kontinuierlichen Lehrplan oder als individualisierter Privatunterricht stattfinden.

Hinzu kommen Veröffentlichungen aus den Forschungsergebnissen. Geplant sind auch Bücher und Zeitschriften zu den verschiedenen Lebensthemen rund um die Kultivierungspraxis.

Folgende Themengebiete sind vorgesehen

  • Daoyin - Führen und Leiten des Qi
  • Neigong – Innere Übungen (z.B. Stilles Qigong)
  • Taijiquan
  • Chinesische Medizin
  • Fengshui
  • Bazi Sunming (Berechnung der Lebensrhythmiken)
  • Qimen Dunjia (Berechnungen zu Strategien zu verschiedenen Themen wie bspw. Beruf)
  • Teekultur

  • Klassische chinesische Musik
  • uvm.

Die Kursdauer kann bspw. ein Wochenende betragen, zehn Tage, ein Monat oder auch bis zu drei und mehr Jahren bei Ausbildungen wie die schon existierende Yangsheng Praktiker Ausbildung.

Teaching Program and Offers in Center

Next to our research area in the center our focus will be on education and training.

The classes will be done in the form of weekend courses, retreats, holidays and intensive courses, private lessons, preventive applications, etc.. This can be done in three ways. On the one hand in the center in Taiwan by traveling here, on the other hand, by guest seminars in their respective countries and though people skilled by us working in there home countries, as well as through online classes. Depending on the nature and content of each course this can take the form of modules, blocks, continuous curriculum or as individualized private lessons.

There are also publications from the research results. Plans are also books and journals on various topics related to life cultivation practice.

The following topics are provided

➢ Dao Yin - guiding and directing the Qi

➢ Neigong - Inner exercises (e.g. Silent Qigong)

➢ Taijiquan

➢ Chinese Medicine

➢ Fengshui

➢ Bazi Sunming (calculation of life rhythms)

➢ Qimen Dunjia (calculations on strategies on various topics such as career)

➢ Tea Culture

➢ Traditional Chinese music

➢ lots more

The course duration may range between a weekend, ten days, a month or up to three or more years in forms of a schooling such as the already existing Yang Sheng practitioner training.


Forschung

  • Daoyin - Führen und Leiten des Qi
  • Kampfkünste

  • Chinesische Medizin

  • Qimen Dunjia und Bazi Suanming und Gesundheit
  • Chinesische Kalenderwissenschaften, etc.
  • Ein kleiner Shop hilft um die notwendigen Materialien und Hilfsmittel zur Verfügung zu stellen wie bspw.
  • Literatur
  • Tee
  • usw.

Research

➢ dao yin - guiding and directing the Qi

➢ Chinese Medicine

➢ Qimen Dunjia and Bazi Suanming and Health

➢ Chinese calendar sciences, etc.

A small shop is going to help to provide necessary materials and tools:

➢ Literature

➢ Tea

➢ etc.


Alle profitieren davon!

Einer der wichtigsten Ziele ist es dass alle Menschen langfristig davon profitieren, indem sie ihr Leben verbessern und somit auch ihre Umwelt gestalten können.

  • Verbesserung der eigenen Gesundheit
  • Altes Wissen zur heutigen Verwendung praktikabel machen
  • Stressreduktion
  • Verbesserung der Lebensgrundlage
  • Strategien zur Lebensgestaltung
  • Und vieles mehr!

All profit from it!

The main goal of this center is the enormous long term benefit for all people. They may achieve overall live quality improvements and will thus be able to shape their environment.

➢ improve their health,

➢ make Ancient knowledge to practical use today

➢ Stress Reduction

➢ Improving livelihoods

➢ strategies for healthier and happier lifestyle

    Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

    Auch wenn Ihr Euch nicht finanziell beteiligen könnt, so ist eine weitere Möglichkeit das Projekt zu unterstützen dies weiter zu Empfehlen, bspw. bei Freunden, über Facebook, etc. hierzu gibt es auch ein Tool das Ihr benutzen könnt.

      Vielen Dank

      Others  ways to help

      Post to Facebook or tell Your friends - in the end, the more people hear about them, the more likely they are to meet their target.

      Thank you!

story:
WHO WE ARE
Ruby’s Place has been serving survivors of domestic violence, human trafficking and homeless women and their children throughout Alameda County and the Bay Area since 1972. The mission of Ruby’s Place is to provide prevention and supportive services to the community and people impacted by domestic violence, human trafficking or homelessness. Our vision is: Safe and stable families, one person at a time. Ruby’s Place offers a no-fee 42-bed emergency shelter, 24-hour crisis line, case management, therapy, children’s program, and supportive transitional housing. We serve over 250 low income individuals per year in the shelter, and additionally over 4,500 through the crisis line, Speakers Bureau and no-fee Community Outreach Program.

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP NOW

As many people know funding for non-profits have been decreasing since the recession hit in 2008. The direct impact it has had on shelters is devastating, short of closing our doors we have had to reduce staffing, cut programs, and often rely on the kindness of our community to provide donations to support us. Ruby’s Place has lost $70,000 in funding the last two years due to a funders change in focus. This directly impacted our children’s program which focuses on the intervention of abuse, early intervention for healing from trauma and family counseling. As a result,  this program lost a full time therapist and we had to combine programs in order to continue to provide these services.

WHAT YOUR DONATION WILL DO

Funding from donors like you will go directly to supporting the families we serve. Donations pay for food, bedding, therapy sessions, books and supplies for the children, art therapy supplies, emergency transportation for clients in a dangerous home, the 24 hour crisis line, or a DV support group facilitator.

THE ISSUE

Domestic violence affects all families across the world, every social economic status, every race, gender and ethnicity. We serve wives and children of doctors, police officers and politicians. We also serve the wives and children of gang members and drug dealers. 1 in 4 women will be affected by domestic violence. That means that 1 in 4 women in YOUR life will be touched by abuse. Our clients are not weak or un-resourceful, they are scared but strong women.

WHO WE SERVE

Participants in the program consist of mothers and children ages 0-18 who are current or former residents of Ruby’s Place. Services including individual and group counseling, parent consultation, structured play groups, and after-school support are available to all families upon admission to the shelter. Healing from trauma is often a long and difficult process, therefore children and families are offered aftercare services that extend beyond their stay and successful transition to permanent housing. Aftercare services are provided to clients in their residences, via telephone or at Ruby’s Place adjacent therapy center.

Families arrive at the shelter after having been exposed to an array of traumatic events. They often experience symptoms of anxiety, depression, and behavioral problems. To identify areas of concern, the staff conducts a comprehensive assessment upon intake. Mental health services, case management/advocacy, and community referrals are offered to each family based on its unique set of emotional, physical, and behavioral needs.

 We provide quality service and a safe place for women and children no matter what time of day or night.

Last year 83% of our clients came to our facility due to a violent crime and 17% due to non-violent homelessness. The high populations of women that we serve are victims of domestic violence and have no support system, are financially unstable due to victimization and mental health issues, all due to severe trauma. Many of the women are victimized and controlled due to their legal status or lack of language skills. Immigration status creates barriers for restraining orders, social services, housing and education. The families are limited in knowledge as to what their rights are and how to advocate for themselves. When it comes to legal issues the process is often long, confusing and expensive. Again, the families are often misinformed or scared to involve law enforcement due to immigration status, threats or otherwise.

THE CHILDREN SUFFER TOO

Out of the 245 unduplicated clients we served, 153 were children. The children that enter our shelter are traumatized, scared, and have often been abused. They are in need of educational advocacy, developmental assessment and counseling, medical referrals and trauma/attachment therapy.

WHAT YOU CAN DO

Make a tax deductible donation TODAY and help us continue or 43 year hsitory of serving those who need us most.

Thank you from all of us at Ruby's Place

story:
A REVOLUTION IS COMING TO THE MODEL INDUSTRY

Are you tired of seeing the typical 6ft tall size 2 models in the fashion industry? Have you ever auditioned or thought about being a model but don’t feel beautiful or handsome enough due to the stipulations that the model industry has placed upon society that successful fashion models can only be tall and thin? Well an revolution is on the rise and an army is forming. An army consisting of aspiring models of various sizes joining forces to break all barriers in the fashion industry. This army is called, Elbert Ivory Models. 


OUR MISSION

ELBERT IVORY MODELS is a model agency that provides competitive fashion photo shoot challenges & model workshops to assist in building aspiring models of various sizes and disabilities portfolios for free. Elbert Ivory Models was founded on March 17, 2014 by Elbert Ivory. We currently represents over 120 aspiring models in the South East Region of the United States. 


Who is Elbert Ivory?

Just call Elbert Ivory "Professor Xavier" of the model industry. Elbert Ivory is an fashion photographer, model coach & aspiring model. Unfortunately due to his height at only 5ft tall, he was not eligible to be accepted in a model agency so he decided to take a dream for himself and instill it within other aspiring models When starting Elbert Ivory Models Agency he vowed to not discriminate against and accept aspiring models of various sizes . Elbert was born and raised in Chicago Illinois but currently lives in Atlanta, Georgia. In Fall 2013 Elbert hosted a mock live version of the hit reality competition show, “America’s Next Top Model” at his local community college called, Georgia Perimeter College. The live show was a big success on campus attracting over 100+ aspiring models on campus to audition. With the success of the live campus show Elbert had plans to expand his modeling goals. Building a model portfolio can cost hundreds and sometimes thousands of dollars and Elbert could not afford to build his portfolio so he decided to help aspiring models build theirs at no cost by having them compete in unique themed fashion photo shoot challenges. Elbert purchased his first Canon camera and began scouting aspiring models on his college campus to form his army, thus Elbert Ivory Models was born. Since the birth of Elbert Ivory Models his league of extraordinary models has grown to 126 aspiring models located in various states in South East. Elbert Ivory has plans to purchase his first agency facility in Atlanta, Georgia in 2015 with future expansion plans for various major U.S cities and countries. 


Elbert Ivory Models proposed agency location

Here are images of creative office space for lease in Atlanta Ga. This is the proposed location for Elbert Ivory Model Agency



What will be included in Elbert Ivory Models Agency

  • welcome lounge
  • office space for model agent(s) and model scouts 
  • state of the art photography studio space
  • business meeting room
  • model workshop classroom 
  • dressing rooms
  • photography and event equipment storage space
  • hair/makeup room
  • restrooms

Who may utilize Elbert Ivory Models Agency

  • Aspiring Models of various sizes, disabilities and ages can attend casting calls, model workshops & themed fashion photo shoots
  • Photographers/Videographers can rent photography studio space when not in use 
  • Model agents will book models photo shoot gigs and finalize model contracts with clients


How will your donation be spent?

  • Hire experienced model agent(s) (Agents are responsible for negotiating model contracts & booking paid gigs for models)
  • Hire administration office Interns (Responsible for fielding telephone calls, receiving and directing visitors, word processing, creating spreadsheets and presentations, and filing
  • Lease office or industrial space approximately 3,000-10,000sq 
  • State of the art photography studio space 
  • welcome lounge
  • office space for casting/model agents 
  • business meeting room 
  • model classroom (multi-purpose room)
  • dressing/makeup rooms 
  • equipment storage space 
  • restrooms 


So whats the point of all this!?

  • To create a model agency that accepts aspiring models based upon their talent, skills and willingness to grow with the agency and not based on their height, weight nor disability.
  • Give aspiring models the tools to prepare them for the model industry 
  • Teach aspiring models on posing & runway techniques
  • Allow aspiring models to build their portfolios for free
  • Give aspiring models of various height, weight and disabilities the opportunity to book paid photo shoots and a chance to become successful models in the industry.


The Impact

With your donations and support you will be contributing to make fashion history by starting the world’s first successful equal opportunity model agency that hires aspiring models based upon their talent, skills and personality and not based upon their height & waist size. Let’s break all barriers in the fashion industry.

Where will Elbert Ivory Models Agency be located?

We are looking into establishing the first Elbert Ivory Models Agency in Atlanta, Georgia with future plans in expanding to various major cities in the United States such as New York and Los Angeles.

When will Elbert Ivory Models Agency Host it’s Grand Opening?

With your help in surpassing our goal by $100,000 we anticipate having a grand opening in Atlanta Georgia by winter 2015 with near future plans to launch agencies in New York and Los Angeles.


How will the model agency generate revenue?

  • Model agent(s) booking models for paid photo shoots/gigs
  • Photographers/Videographers and businesses may rent photography studio space when not in use 
  • Elbert Ivory Models will host cosplay events, fashion shows, fundraising galas and other unique events to continue to raise money.

The future of Elbert Ivory Models

We envision launching hundreds of successful aspiring models careers producing many other Elbert Ivory Model Agencies across the U.S and eventually the world. If we are able to surpass our goal by $1,000,000 this will give us the opportunity to look into expanding Elbert Ivory Model Agency into new markets such as Los Angeles, New York, Miami, Toronto-Canada, Rio de Janeiro-Brazil, Seoul-South Korea, London, Paris & Milan. Expanding into new markets is very expensive but with your powerful voice and generous donation this will surely be possible. Join Elbert Ivory Models and help build an army of aspiring models across the nation together and break all barriers in the model industry.


Get a closer look at the current Elbert Ivory Models

 Want a closer look at Elbert Ivory Models? We currently manage over 100 aspiring models in the South East region of the United States with most models in Georgia and several residing in, Florida, Alabama, Mississippi, South Carolina and Tennessee. For a closer look at Elbert Ivory Models visit www.elbertivorymodels.com

Stretch Goals:

We can do it!

At $100,000 we can begin hiring model agent(s) to start networking with potential clients such as Nike, Gap, H&M & Express, schedule bookings and negotiate model contracts

We can do it!

At $500,000 we can targeting and marketing & schedule meetings with potential clients for our agency. Persuade potential clients to hire our models for their next campaign ad and photo shoots.

Push it to the MAX

At $750,000 we can add state of the art features to our photography studio space

Mission Impossible

At $1,000,000 we will begin the process of adding another Elbert Ivory Models agency in New York City or Los Angeles after the successful completion of Elbert Ivory Models agency in Atlanta Georgia. Due to the high cost per square foot space in NYC & L.A, these locations would be office space only for model agents and model scouts.

WOW! MORE THAN A $1,000,000!

We need you to help us exceed our goal so we can look into expanding to various fashion capitols such as New York City. We appreciate all your hard work and support in Liking, sharing, tweeting and donating your hard earned money to this 1st of a kind model agency.


How else can you help

We appreciate your generous contribution to this unique project and the help does not stop there. We also need help getting the word out to all your family, friends coworkers, cosplayers and your followers via Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, Pinterest, Tumblr and all your favorite social networking sites. Be sure to share this agency with your favorite fashion companies such as Nike & H&M. Spread the word to them as they may be potential clients for Elbert Ivory Models! Encourage everyone you know to join in on our creation. Let’s revolutionize the model industry.

Make us go VIRAL!

Make a youtube video about us, tweet, write a song, paint a portrait in inspiration to Elbert Ivory Models,  tag random people, share us with your friends, coworkers even your ex! Let the world know who we are!


We appreciate our backers!

You are the most important piece of this project. Without you and your donations Elbert Ivory Models will not succeed. To show our appreciation we have created exceptional personalized rewards tailored just for you. Enjoy an exclusive photo shoot with our models, receive tickets to Elbert Ivory Models Agency Grand opening, personalized plaque mounted in Elbert Ivory Model agency wall and so much more rewards.


Risks and challenges

The fashion industry is extremely competitive and a cutthroat business. Finding the perfect location for Elbert Ivory Models Agency is crucial and takes strategic planning. We realize that Atlanta, Georgia is predominantly a commercial based fashion market while New York, Paris and Milan which contains all markets in the model industry. Once the location has been finalized and property purchased the next phase will be hiring experienced model agent(s). With the fashion industries strict model height & waist requirements set at 5’9” to 6ft, size 0-6 for females and 5’11” to 6’ 3” size 28-32 for males, Elbert Ivory Models are breaking those requirements with no height and waist size requirements but this is not easy as most clients such as Nike, GAP, H&M, American Apparel, Guess & Express have also set these height and waist standards for their models. We realize that these height and waist size stipulations are in place as a cost effective strategy when fashion designers make sample pieces/outfits for photo shoots & fashion shows. With your help we can eliminate these requirements by offering potential clients creative ways to save them money while revolutionizing in the fashion industry by booking models of various sizes. Only the most successful model agencies survive. Successful agencies consists of exceptional models with the best model agents scheduling and booking models for clients such as Nike, Guess, Gap, Versace etc. Elbert Ivory Models will strive to become the first equal opportunity Model Agency in the world. As a backer of our project you will be rewarded not only with tangible items but with satisfaction that you contributed to an agency that will be break all barriers and change the face of the fashion industry forever. Thank you kindly. 


                    ELBERT IVORY MODELS QUESTIONS & ANSWERS

Q.What does E.I stand for?

A. E.I stands for Elbert Ivory. 

Q.What is Elbert Ivory Models?

  1. Elbert Ivory Models is a model league consisting of exceptional beautiful & handsome aspiring models of various shapes and sizes that are breaking barriers in the modeling industry. We are also a modeling service that provides free model workshops & fashion photo shoots to assist in building our models portfolios for free. These photo shoots are highly themed and competitive consisting of 10-16 models per photo shoot with eliminations similar to the hit reality tv competition America's Next Top Model. 

Q. How is Elbert Ivory Models funded?

A. Elbert Ivory Models is funded solely through Elbert Ivory himself. 

Q. Is Elbert Ivory Models registered with the State of Georgia as a business?

A. Yes of course. Elbert Ivory Models is registered with the Secretary of State in Fulton County Georgia.

Q. What does Elbert Ivory look for in an Elbert Ivory Model?

  1. Elbert Ivory accept aspiring models of all shapes, sizes, ethnicities & disabilities. As long as you have the gift and talent for modeling than you too shall feel inspired to model. We have special interest in aspiring models that are also cosplayers as they tend to have creative minds and make exceptional models. Some of the many other qualities is a wonderful personality and a distinctive look that makes you unique. 

Q. Does Elbert Ivory Models accepts LGBTQ individuals?

A. Yes of course! We proudly accept models regardless of gender or sexual orientation. 

Q.Where is Elbert Ivory Models based out of?

A. Elbert Ivory Models is currently located in Atlanta,Ga. There is no current agency building location however there are plans for an agency. Future location plans coming to various major cities around the world.

Q. I live out of state can I still become an Elbert Ivory Model?

A. Yes of course. No matter were you live, you may submit an application for Elbert Ivory Models. We are currently representing models in Georgia-U.S and in the South East region. Check back soon for future locations in your area. 

Q. Do you charge Elbert Ivory Models for photo shoots?

A. No. One of the many perks of being an Elbert Ivory Model is that Elbert Ivory assist his models in building their portfolios free of charge! Elbert Ivory Models never pay for Elbert Ivory photography’s photo shoots. So keep your hard earn money in your bank account. 

Q. Do models get booked for paid gigs? Do you pay models for photo shoots? 

A. Elbert Ivory Models is a modeling service that provides complimentary model workshops & photo shoots to assist in building our models portfolios for free. We currently do not book gigs nor pay our models but prepare our models for the current & future modeling industries. However we do have plans to hire model agents to book gigs for our models. 

Q. What are the perks of being an Elbert Ivory Model?

A. There are several, such as building your portfolios free of charge, free model posing/runway workshops and complimentary entry to all Elbert Ivory Model & events. 

Q. Is Elbert Ivory Models under contract? 

A. Models are required to sign an agreement form prior to booking photo shoots. The agreement form outlines all the privileges for Elbert Ivory Models, rights & protections of models and Elbert Ivory Model staff. More details about agreement form are given upon acceptance into Elbert Ivory Models.

Q. Do Elbert Ivory Models have an agent?

 A. All models are currently managed by Elbert Ivory. 

Q. I already have an modeling agency representing me can I still become an Elbert Ivory Model?

A. Yes of course you can. Please make sure your in compliance with your current agency.

Q. Is hair, makeup and wardrobe provided at all photo shoots?

A. No, only at particular photo shoots is hair, makeup and wardrobe provided. However, this will change soon with all photo shoots including a full hair and makeup crew.

Q. I’m a professional photographer, fashion designer and or a magazine editor and I would like to book one of your models. What is the process?

A. For booking inquires please email Elbert Ivory at elbertivory@elbertivorymodels.com  

Q. Is there an age restriction?

A. No. We are currently interested in models of all ages. Models under 18 must be accompanied by a legal guardian at every photo shoot and model workshop.

Q. How can I become an Elbert Ivory Model?

A. We would love to hear from you. To submit your application photos, click on the Submissions tab on the website located on the top right of the home page. Read and follow the instructions for submissions. After you have successfully submitted your application, your information and photos will be reviewed. If you do not receive a response within 90 days, please feel inspired to resubmit. 

Q. Are there casting calls?

A. But of course! Check back daily on the Elbert Ivory Models Events page for updates on Elbert Ivory Models exclusive casting calls but we strongly suggest you apply via submissions to receive the casting call details.


FOLLOW ELBERT IVORY MODELS ON OUR JOURNEY 

Website: www.elbertivorymodels.com

Facebook: www.facebook.com/elbertivorymodels

Instagram: @elbertivorymodels

Twitter: @elbertmodels


Honorable Mention

Special thanks to the following Elbert Ivory Models that shared their stories and contributed to putting this video together

Matty

Alexandra B.

Alexandra D.

Asch

Etuaje

Stephen

Roger 

Kitsu

Extra Special thanks to Legion Ivory for producing original music for the video

At $1,000,000 we will begin the process of adding another Elbert Ivory Models agency in New York City or Los Angeles after the successful completion of Elbert Ivory Models agency in Atlanta Georgia. Due to the high cost per square foot space in NYC & L.A, these locations would be office space only for model agents and model scouts.
WOW! MORE THAN A $1,000,000!
We need you to help us exceed our goal so we can look into expanding to various fashion capitols such as New York City. We appreciate all your hard work and support in Liking, sharing, tweeting and donating your hard earned money to this 1st of a kind model agency.
How else can you help
We appreciate your generous contribution to this unique project and the help does not stop there. We also need help getting the word out to all your family, friends coworkers, cosplayers and your followers via Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, Pinterest, Tumblr and all your favorite social networking sites. Be sure to share this agency with your favorite fashion companies such as Nike & H&M. Spread the word to them as they may be potential clients for Elbert Ivory Models! Encourage everyone you know to join in on our creation. Let’s revolutionize the model industry.


Make us go VIRAL!
Make a youtube video about us, tweet, write a song, paint a portrait in inspiration to Elbert Ivory Models,  tag random people, share us with your friends, coworkers even your ex! Let the world know who we are!
We appreciate our backers!
You are the most important piece of this project. Without you and your donations Elbert Ivory Models will not succeed. To show our appreciation we have created exceptional personalized rewards tailored just for you. Enjoy an exclusive photo shoot with our models, receive tickets to Elbert Ivory Models Agency Grand opening, personalized plaque mounted in Elbert Ivory Model agency wall and so much more rewards.


Risks and challenges
The fashion industry is extremely competitive and a cutthroat business. Finding the perfect location for Elbert Ivory Models Agency is crucial and takes strategic planning. We realize that Atlanta, Georgia is predominantly a commercial based fashion market while New York, Paris and Milan which contains all markets in the model industry. Once the location has been finalized and property purchased the next phase will be hiring experienced model agent(s). With the fashion industries strict model height & waist requirements set at 5’9” to 6ft, size 0-6 for females and 5’11” to 6’ 3” size 28-32 for males, Elbert Ivory Models are breaking those requirements with no height and waist size requirements but this is not easy as most clients such as Nike, GAP, H&M, American Apparel, Guess & Express have also set these height and waist standards for their models. We realize that these height and waist size stipulations are in place as a cost effective strategy when fashion designers make sample pieces/outfits for photo shoots & fashion shows. With your help we can eliminate these requirements by offering potential clients creative ways to save them money while revolutionizing in the fashion industry by booking models of various sizes. Only the most successful model agencies survive. Successful agencies consists of exceptional models with the best model agents scheduling and booking models for clients such as Nike, Guess, Gap, Versace etc. Elbert Ivory Models will strive to become the first equal opportunity Model Agency in the world. As a backer of our project you will be rewarded not only with tangible items but with satisfaction that you contributed to an agency that will be break all barriers and change the face of the fashion industry forever. Thank you kindly. 
                    ELBERT IVORY MODELS QUESTIONS & ANSWERS
Q.What does E.I stand for?
A. E.I stands for Elbert Ivory. 
Q.What is Elbert Ivory Models?

Elbert Ivory Models is a model league consisting of exceptional beautiful & handsome aspiring models of various shapes and sizes that are breaking barriers in the modeling industry. We are also a modeling service that provides free model workshops & fashion photo shoots to assist in building our models portfolios for free. These photo shoots are highly themed and competitive consisting of 10-16 models per photo shoot with eliminations similar to the hit reality tv competition America's Next Top Model. 

Q. How is Elbert Ivory Models funded?
A. Elbert Ivory Models is funded solely through Elbert Ivory himself. 
Q. Is Elbert Ivory Models registered with the State of Georgia as a business?
A. Yes of course. Elbert Ivory Models is registered with the Secretary of State in Fulton County Georgia.
Q. What does Elbert Ivory look for in an Elbert Ivory Model?

Elbert Ivory accept aspiring models of all shapes, sizes, ethnicities & disabilities. As long as you have the gift and talent for modeling than you too shall feel inspired to model. We have special interest in aspiring models that are also cosplayers as they tend to have creative minds and make exceptional models. Some of the many other qualities is a wonderful personality and a distinctive look that makes you unique. 

Q. Does Elbert Ivory Models accepts LGBTQ individuals?
A. Yes of course! We proudly accept models regardless of gender or sexual orientation. 
Q.Where is Elbert Ivory Models based out of?
A. Elbert Ivory Models is currently located in Atlanta,Ga. There is no current agency building location however there are plans for an agency. Future location plans coming to various major cities around the world.
Q. I live out of state can I still become an Elbert Ivory Model?
A. Yes of course. No matter were you live, you may submit an application for Elbert Ivory Models. We are currently representing models in Georgia-U.S and in the South East region. Check back soon for future locations in your area. 
Q. Do you charge Elbert Ivory Models for photo shoots?
A. No. One of the many perks of being an Elbert Ivory Model is that Elbert Ivory assist his models in building their portfolios free of charge! Elbert Ivory Models never pay for Elbert Ivory photography’s photo shoots. So keep your hard earn money in your bank account. 

Q. Do models get booked for paid gigs? Do you pay models for photo shoots? 
A. Elbert Ivory Models is a modeling service that provides complimentary model workshops & photo shoots to assist in building our models portfolios for free. We currently do not book gigs nor pay our models but prepare our models for the current & future modeling industries. However we do have plans to hire model agents to book gigs for our models. 
Q. What are the perks of being an Elbert Ivory Model?
A. There are several, such as building your portfolios free of charge, free model posing/runway workshops and complimentary entry to all Elbert Ivory Model & events. 
Q. Is Elbert Ivory Models under contract? 
A. Models are required to sign an agreement form prior to booking photo shoots. The agreement form outlines all the privileges for Elbert Ivory Models, rights & protections of models and Elbert Ivory Model staff. More details about agreement form are given upon acceptance into Elbert Ivory Models.
Q. Do Elbert Ivory Models have an agent?
 A. All models are currently managed by Elbert Ivory. 
Q. I already have an modeling agency representing me can I still become an Elbert Ivory Model?
A. Yes of course you can. Please make sure your in compliance with your current agency.
Q. Is hair, makeup and wardrobe provided at all photo shoots?
A. No, only at particular photo shoots is hair, makeup and wardrobe provided. However, this will change soon with all photo shoots including a full hair and makeup crew.
Q. I’m a professional photographer, fashion designer and or a magazine editor and I would like to book one of your models. What is the process?
A. For booking inquires please email Elbert Ivory at elbertivory@elbertivorymodels.com  
Q. Is there an age restriction?
A. No. We are currently interested in models of all ages. Models under 18 must be accompanied by a legal guardian at every photo shoot and model workshop.
Q. How can I become an Elbert Ivory Model?
A. We would love to hear from you. To submit your application photos, click on the Submissions tab on the website located on the top right of the home page. Read and follow the instructions for submissions. After you have successfully submitted your application, your information and photos will be reviewed. If you do not receive a response within 90 days, please feel inspired to resubmit. 
Q. Are there casting calls?
A. But of course! Check back daily on the Elbert Ivory Models Events page for updates on Elbert Ivory Models exclusive casting calls but we strongly suggest you apply via submissions to receive the casting call details.

FOLLOW ELBERT IVORY MODELS ON OUR JOURNEY 
Website: www.elbertivorymodels.com
Facebook: www.facebook.com/elbertivorymodels
Instagram: @elbertivorymodels
Twitter: @elbertmodels


Honorable Mention
Special thanks to the following Elbert Ivory Models that shared their stories and contributed to putting this video together
Matty
Alexandra B.
Alexandra D.
Asch
Etuaje
Stephen
Roger 
Kitsu
Extra Special thanks to Legion Ivory for producing original music for the video

story:
Hello, My name is Chad Eastin and I would love to share with you how a local coffee shop is impacting Enid OK and the world in a big way and give you the opportunity to partner in that.

Let me first introduce you to the Five80 coffeehouse and tell you a little about what we do. Five80 is a local non-profit business (under the umbrella of Forgotten ministries) created with two purposes in mind. First it is providing a place of community for all walks of life in Enid. You will see everyone from Lawyers and Politicians to the homeless and lonely coming to seek refuge from daily life, have business meetings, celebrate life events and simply enjoy excellent coffee and food. The way we are able to offer this service is through our “pay as you can” business model. This model only asks people to pay whatever they can whether that is the suggested total or nothing at all, they will still receive the same courtesy and dignity. You can follow the link (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8PzySNEJrBg) to watch a short video that conveys our heart. Secondly, we are a fund producer for local charities and organizations that are performing philanthropic work day in and day out here in Enid and around the world. As a business we are careful to run as efficiently as possible to create the most income that we can in order to better serve the “charity of the month”. Our whole goal is to create a financial resource for those seeking to better our community.

A few of the organizations that we have supported are: Forgotten Ministries (our "parent" organization), Monroe Elementary, Touch India, Hosanna Ministries, and an organization building schools in Zambia. Some of the things these organizations have done with the money include, but are not limited to, feeding and clothing the homeless in Enid, provide fans and AC units to low income families in the summer, provide coats and gloves to low income children for the winter, help orphans and widows in India, build schools in Africa, and provide fresh water to third world countries.

On average we have been able to give around $2,000 away each month and desire for that number to increase. The vision for increasing the amount of money that we have comes down to one thing; a roaster. Buying a roaster is a huge step for our coffeehouse, not only will it allow us to save the money that we normally use buying our roasted coffee, but is also gives us the opportunity to supply other coffeehouses and grocery stores with our roasted coffee. When we are up and running with our roasting we will easily double the money that we are sending out each month to the community of Enid.

Here is where I am asking you to step in and partner with us. The cost of the roaster and the build out will be right around $35,000. We have already secured $18,000 and we still need $17,000 in order to begin this endeavor. I am asking you to make an investment into our cause that will in turn multiply itself over and over again and will never stop producing funds to pour into Enid. It is a sound investment by any measure. We have proven ourselves again and again to be responsible and efficient with what we have been entrusted. We have been open for over a year and we are totally debt free ensuring that all money brought in, goes right back out to support the charity or organization of the month.

story:
Hello,

My name is Melissa and Al is my husband of almost 15 years. We are a loving and fun couple who has been looking forward to being parents for a long time.  We had no idea how common infertility was until it was our turn to go through it.  It is not only embarrassing and painful to talk about it, but it carries with it a stigma of inferiority and guilt, that is often a burden that can take its toll on the strongest mind.  Too many of us carry the shame of unspoken failure and soon a month turns into a year and a year into countless nights of tears, frustration and disappointment.  What do we do?  Who do we turn to? We’ve been down the path of treatments, multiple miscarriages and more heartbreak, but now we have renewed hope. 

We have come to the realization that there are many ways to form a family and adoption has become our new path.  We are ready to be parents and love a child unconditionally and provide a home filled with encouragement, patience, discipline, guidance, laughter and all those things that a healthy relationship can provide a little one. 

Why do we need help?  We are working with a private adoption agency and are in the initial stages of a domestic adoption.  Our first application has been submitted, but adoption is an extremely expensive process due to the large amount of legal documentation to be processed.  It is very tempting to throw your hands up and give up, but we have never found that good things come easy and sometimes it’s ok to ask for help. 

It has been said many times that it takes a village to raise a child, but we believe that for us, it is going to take a village to bring ours home.  We invite you to be a part of our village, our story, through your support, encouragement and words of wisdom.  There are many benefits to helping others and you will be making a difference, a huge difference in a child’s life. 

Thank you for your support!  It means more than you can imagine and if you are not able to provide financial support, please leave us words of encouragement or take time to talk to someone that is going through infertility.  Show them they are not alone. 

We would like to give another couple the chance to start their own adoption fund.  Help us exceed our goal and we will pay it forward by donating the overage to a couple of our choice. 


           *******SPANISH*******ESPAÑOL*******


Hola,

Mi nombre es Melissa y Al es mi esposo de casi 15 años. Somos una pareja amorosa y divertida que ha estado a la espera de ser padres por mucho tiempo. No teníamos ni idea de cuán común es la infertilidad hasta que llegó nuestro turno para pasar por ella. No sólo es vergonzoso y doloroso hablar de ello, pero lleva consigo un estigma de inferioridad y culpa, que a menudo es una carga que puede hacer mella en la mente fuerte. Muchos de nosotros llevamos la vergüenza del fracaso silencioso y pronto un mes se convierte en un año y un año en incontables noches de lágrimas, frustración y decepción. ¿Qué hacemos? ¿A quién recurrir? Hemos estado por el camino de los tratamientos, múltiples abortos involuntarios y más angustia, pero ahora hemos renovado la esperanza.

Hemos llegado a la conclusión de que hay muchas maneras de formar una familia y la adopción se ha convertido en nuestro nuevo camino. Estamos preparados para ser padres y darle amor incondicional a un niño y proporcionar un hogar lleno de ánimo, paciencia, disciplina, guianza, risa y todas esas cosas que una relación sana puede proporcionarle a un niño.

¿Por qué necesitamos ayuda? Estamos trabajando con una agencia de adopción privada y estamos en las etapas iniciales de una adopción nacional. Nuestra primera aplicación ha sido presentada, pero la adopción es un proceso extremadamente costoso debido a la gran cantidad de documentación legal para ser procesado. Es muy tentador querer tirar las manos al aire y darse por vencido, pero nunca hemos encontrado que las cosas buenas vienen fácil y a veces tenemos que pedir ayuda.

Se ha dicho muchas veces que se necesita un pueblo para criar a un niño, pero creemos que para nosotros, va a tomar un pueblo para traer un hijo a nuestro hogar. Te invitamos a ser parte de nuestro pueblo, a nuestra historia, a través de tu apoyo, aliento y palabras de sabiduría. Hay muchos beneficios en ayudar a los demás y sabes que vas a estar haciendo una diferencia, una gran diferencia en la vida de un niño.

Gracias por tu apoyo! Esto significa más de lo que puedas imaginar y si no tienes la capacidad de proporcionar apoyo financiero, por favor déjanos palabras de aliento o toma el tiempo para hablar con alguien que está pasando por el proceso de infertilidad. Muéstrales que no están solos.

Nos gustaría darle otra pareja la oportunidad de iniciar su propio fondo para la adopción. Ayúdanos a superar nuestro objetivo financiero y vamos a devolver el favor donando un porcentaje del excedente a una pareja de nuestra elección.

story:
8Cups is the winnter (1st) in Samsung Wennovation contest. 

http://koreatimes.co.kr/www/news/people/2015/01/178_171870.html

We're excited to share this news with all of our funders as we look forward to a successful year. 

Thank you! 8Cups Team.  :) 


The Problem:

Only 2% of adults drink the recommended two liters, or eight glasses, of water per day. Doctors and nutritionists have recommended this for years, yet still most of us fail to meet that goal. But why? Here’s what we know:

  • Without water, a person will die within three days.

  • Without enough water, dehydration occurs and can cause electrolyte imbalances.

  • Without enough water, our brain function suffers, we feel tired, and our bowels slow down.

We know these things are true, so it isn’t a huge leap to understand that:

  • Appropriate water intake detoxifies the body.

  • Adequate water intake helps you think more clearly.

  • Balanced water drinking keeps urine diluted and decreases the risk of urinary stones.

  • When you drink enough water, your skin and hair look better.

  • 8 cups of water each day makes you feel better, improves your performance mentally and physically, and makes you look healthier.

With all of this information that we already know, why don’t we drink enough water? In many cases, we just don’t think about it or prioritize it the way we should. Many of us mistake thirst for hunger.

The Solution:

8Cups is a smart water bottle that syncs with an app on your mobile phone to track your water intake and remind you to drink more.


8Cups integrated sensors trigger an LED display to remind you drink water on a regular, timed basis. 

When you drink, the amount is synced to your app so that you can track how much you have ingested and how much you have left to drink that day to meet your water intake goal.

Each day’s water intake data is saved in the app for future reference.

The Key Features of 8Cups:

8Cups utilizes a wireless charging system. Each charge lasts up to one week of use. This is particularly useful when traveling or engaging in outdoor activities where charging ports may not be readily available.

The 8Cups bottle is completely waterproof. All of the technology and sensors are sealed within the design and will not be damaged during everyday use and washing.

A no-slip rubber bottom keeps your 8Cups from slipping or sliding on smooth or wet surfaces.

The 8Cups is constructed of Tritan, a safe, BPA-free type of plastic that is long-lasting, and wear resistant. Because it will replace disposable water bottles, it is eco-friendly.

*Specifications are tentative.

Who Could Use an 8Cups?

It’s more like, who couldn’t use an 8Cups?! Anyone can benefit from the ability to effortlessly monitor their water intake. 

Specifically, people engaging in sports can ensure hydration, those with dry skin or hair issues, or people with medical conditions that require adequate water intake to dilute medication or improve symptoms. This is truly an innovation that anyone can use. And it’s an awesome gift!

For those of you sitting in an office all day, drinking coffee or soda, you’d feel more awake and clear-headed if you drank enough water. Let us introduce you to 8Cups!

Ladies (and gentlemen) watching their figures, drinking water is the most important part of a healthy diet or weight loss program. It also makes your hair look fantastic and shiny and your skin glowing. Let 8Cups help you remember to keep up with your water intake!


Colors

Not everyone wants a bland one-color only option for a water bottle. That’s why we are offering our 8Cups in 5 amazing colors: Pure White, Space Black, Deep Purple, Shiny Emerald, and Ruby Red.



Software

The 8Cups software features include a calendar with a timeline that graphs your water intake in comparison to the recommended daily amount of two liters. It provides motivation with reminders and the option to take photos for comparison as your skin and health improve. The software also allows you to set your own goals for water intake. Want to drink more than 2 liters? Set your own goals and challenge yourself. The app tracks your intake, so you can see how many days in a row you drank your full target amount of water. We will continue to add features to enhance your hydrating experience.

 Now draft of smartphone application is on progress. 


Smartwatch Integration

We are planning an integration option with smartwatches. Since many of these contain fitness-related apps, your water status will be evaluated with activity and environmental conditions.

Specifications:

*Specifications are tentative.

How does 8Cups sensor assess the water level?

Adapting IR sensor for leveling is unique idea of 8Cups, The principal of this idea is that the light bends when it meets the water. Then, if the water is in the container, the receiver on the opposite direction cannot receive the light from the sender and vice versa. 8Cups applied patented technology by using these facts. By these facts, 8Cups has advantage on cost efficiency. Thus, 8Cups catches two hares which are cost cutting and technological innovation at once. 

IR leveling sensor that 8Cups team’s own technology to measuring water leveling permitted to be patent registered on KIPO (Korea Intellectual Property Organization) on January 22nd 2015. 

Now 8Cups team will apply PCT(http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patent_Cooperation...), then going to request patent to U.S, EU and other regions. 

What We’ve Already Accomplished

Working Mock up - The amount of water consumption is automatically updated on your smartphone. We have finished developing the main functions between the bottle and application. 

We have created a method that works without direct contact with the water contents. It uses light emitting and receiving sensors with patented infrared technology that has been developed by the company.

A handmade prototype has been successfully produced.

Currently, we are building the printed circuit board.

AND we have launched a beta version of our app in the Google Play Store! Check out the basic functions before the final product is released! This beta version will be updated with increased functionality when 8Cups is released!

8Cups App for Android (Beta) 

Funding will enable us to move forward with production, covering material and molding costs.


PCB is completed for implementing technology and 8Cups is now stepping forward to actual production. 

 The very first wireless charger is updated! It is going to be circular in the next updated version. 

Box Design

Final version of product packaging design is decided as above. 


Perks

The 8Cups Story

Daniel Joo, the CEO of Jellycoaster, came up with the concept of 8Cups after personal experiences with inadequate water intake. He says, “This past summer, I experienced the discomfort of a urinary stone. My doctor advised me to drink a lot of water as part of the treatment. I was always forgetting to drink and then confused as to how much water I had each day. I couldn’t help but wish there was an easy way to track my water intake.

“Then when my wife became pregnant, her doctor told her drink 8 glasses of water each day without fail. Again, I thought about keeping track of water and how inconvenient it is.

“That’s when the concept of 8Cups was born. Finally, a way to simply drink your water and have it automatically tracked!”

About Jellycoaster

Jellycoaster is an Internet of Things (IoT) company that was founded in 2010 in South Korea. One of their other service, QuickTap, a near field communication (NFC) platform for mobile phone, is very popular among those who have adopted the technology. Jellycoaster has won competitions many times in hackathons.

Jellycoaster Team


Timeline

FAQ

  1. How will I receive my 8Cups?

    Your 8Cups will ship directly from us with a predicted delivery date of late April 2015.

  2. What are the estimated shipping costs?

    • Free to S.Korea

    • $20 to the US

    • $25 for international orders

  3. Is the battery charger included?

    Yes. Everything you need is included.

  4. How do I charge the 8Cups?

    Simply place the bottle on the charger for a few hours and you’re set to go!

  5. Is there a warranty on the product?

    There is a one year warranty. The item will need to be shipped back to Jellycoaster.

  6. Will the 8Cups work with any operating system?

    It will only be compatible with Android and iOS.

  7. Can you adjust the volume of the alert?

    The bottle does not make a sound. The application creates the sound alerts. The volume of the mobile device can adjust the volume.

  8. Will 8Cups sense that I have refilled it even if it wasn’t empty?

    Yes. Our patented infrared sensor will track the water level.

  9. How does the cup reset every day?

    The application resets itself and the cup each day.

  10. Does the top stay attached when I open it?

    The lid is magnetic for attachment, but it does not stay on when the bottle is opened.

  11. How will the smartwatch integration work?

    The bottle connects to the app on the phone, which connects to the smartwatch. It is an extension of the app.

  12. What smartwatches will be supported?

    Those with Android or iOS.

  13. Will the 8Cups look just like the pictures?

    No, the final design is under development. We will post new images when it is finalized.

  14. Are any accessories planned?

    We have a plan for an ease-of-carrying device in the future.

  15. How do I contact you if I have questions?

    Contact us via Facebook, Indiegogo, or email.

16.   How do I add color, size, or other info about my perk selection?
       We will contact you to gather any additional information needed
        to deliver your perks.
story_txt:
8Cups is the winnter (1st) in Samsung Wennovation contest. http://koreatimes.co.kr/www/news/people/2015/01/178_171870.htmlWe're excited to share this news with all of our funders as we look forward to a successful year. Thank you! 8Cups Team.  :) The Problem:
Only 2% of adults drink the recommended
two liters, or eight glasses, of water per day. Doctors and
nutritionists have recommended this for years, yet still most of us
fail to meet that goal. But why? Here’s what we know:


Without water, a person will die
	within three days.


Without enough water, dehydration
	occurs and can cause electrolyte imbalances.


Without enough water, our brain
	function suffers, we feel tired, and our bowels slow down.


We know these things are true, so it
isn’t a huge leap to understand that:


Appropriate
	water intake detoxifies the body.


Adequate water intake helps you
	think more clearly.


Balanced water drinking keeps urine diluted and decreases the risk of urinary stones.


When you drink enough water, your
	skin and hair look better.


8 cups of water each day makes you
	feel better, improves your performance mentally and physically, and
	makes you look healthier.


With all of this information that we
already know, why don’t we drink enough
water? In many cases, we just don’t think about it or
prioritize it the way we should. Many of us mistake thirst for
hunger. 

The Solution:
8Cups is a smart water bottle that
syncs with an app on your mobile phone to track your water intake and
remind you to drink more. 

8Cups integrated sensors trigger an LED
display to remind you drink water on a regular, timed basis. When you
drink, the amount is synced to your app so that you can track how
much you have ingested and how much you have left to drink that day
to meet your water intake goal. 

Each day’s water intake data is saved
in the app for future reference. 

The Key Features of 8Cups:
8Cups utilizes a wireless charging
system. Each charge lasts up to one week of use. This is particularly
useful when traveling or engaging in outdoor activities where
charging ports may not be readily available. 

The 8Cups bottle is completely
waterproof. All of the technology and sensors are sealed within the
design and will not be damaged during everyday use and washing.


A no-slip rubber bottom keeps your 8Cups from slipping or sliding on smooth or wet surfaces.The 8Cups is constructed of Tritan, a safe, BPA-free type of plastic that is long-lasting, and wear resistant. Because it will replace disposable water bottles, it is eco-friendly.*Specifications are tentative.
Who Could Use an 8Cups?
It’s more like, who couldn’t use an
8Cups?! Anyone can benefit from the ability to effortlessly monitor
their water intake. Specifically, people engaging in sports can
ensure hydration, those with dry skin or hair issues, or people with
medical conditions that require adequate water intake to dilute
medication or improve symptoms. This is truly an innovation that
anyone can use. And it’s an awesome gift!
For those of you sitting in an office
all day, drinking coffee or soda, you’d feel more awake and
clear-headed if you drank enough water. Let us introduce you to
8Cups! 

Ladies (and gentlemen) watching their
figures, drinking water is the most important part of a healthy diet
or weight loss program. It also makes your hair look fantastic and
shiny and your skin glowing. Let 8Cups help you remember to keep up
with your water intake!
Colors
Not everyone wants a bland one-color only option for a water bottle. That’s why we are offering our 8Cups in 5 amazing colors: Pure White, Space Black, Deep Purple, Shiny Emerald, and Ruby Red.
Software
The 8Cups software features include a
calendar with a timeline that graphs your water intake in comparison
to the recommended daily amount of two liters. It provides motivation
with reminders and the option to take photos for comparison as your
skin and health improve. The software also allows you to set your own
goals for water intake. Want to drink more than 2 liters? Set your
own goals and challenge yourself. The app tracks your intake, so you can see how many days in a row you drank your full target amount of water. We will continue to add features to enhance your hydrating experience. Now draft of smartphone application is on progress. Smartwatch Integration
We are planning an integration option
with smartwatches. Since many of these contain fitness-related apps,
your water status will be evaluated with activity and environmental
conditions.
Specifications:




*Specifications are tentative.



How does 8Cups sensor assess the water level?

Adapting IR sensor for leveling is unique
idea of 8Cups, The principal of this idea is that the light bends when it meets
the water. Then, if the water is in the container, the receiver on the opposite
direction cannot receive the light from the sender and vice versa. 8Cups applied patented technology by using these facts. By these facts, 8Cups has advantage on
cost efficiency. Thus, 8Cups catches two hares which are cost cutting and
technological innovation at once. 

IR leveling sensor that 8Cups team’s own technology to measuring water leveling permitted to be patent registered on KIPO (Korea Intellectual Property Organization) on January 22nd 2015. 
Now 8Cups team will apply PCT(http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patent_Cooperation...), then going to request patent to U.S, EU and other regions. 
What We’ve Already AccomplishedWorking Mock up - The amount of water consumption is automatically updated on your smartphone. We have finished developing the main functions between the bottle and application. 
We have created a method that works without direct contact with the water contents. It uses light emitting and receiving sensors with patented infrared technology that has been developed by the company.
A handmade prototype has been successfully produced.
Currently, we are building the printed circuit board.
AND we have launched a beta version of our app in the Google Play Store! Check out the basic functions before the final product is released! This beta version will be updated with increased functionality when 8Cups is released!
8Cups App for Android (Beta) 
Funding will enable us to move forward with production, covering material and molding costs.



PCB is completed for implementing
technology and 8Cups is now stepping forward to actual production. 



 The very first wireless charger is updated! It is going to be circular in the next updated version. 

Box Design
Final version of product packaging design is decided as above. 

Perks
The 8Cups Story
Daniel Joo, the CEO of Jellycoaster,
came up with the concept of 8Cups after personal experiences with
inadequate water intake. He says, “This past summer, I
experienced the discomfort of a urinary stone. My doctor advised me to
drink a lot of water as part of the treatment. I was always
forgetting to drink and then confused as to how much water I had each
day. I couldn’t help but wish there was an easy way to track my
water intake.
“Then when my wife became
pregnant, her doctor told her drink 8 glasses of water each day
without fail. Again, I thought about keeping track of water and how
inconvenient it is. 

“That’s when the concept of
8Cups was born. Finally, a way to simply drink your water and have it
automatically tracked!”

Jellycoaster Team

story:
Short Summary

Inspired by Sister Adalbera Mukure, a 75 year old Catholic sister who runs Moyo wa Huruma Orphanage Center in Geita, Tanzania, Africa, the Project Piggery will enable the Orphanage to become self-reliant.  Funds earned from the piggery will support secondary education for the children and other small scale activities. 

What We Need & What You Get

Raise US $12,000 to build a solid piggery, purchase and raise 20 piglets, and offer a future for the children by teaching them animal husbandry and how to effectively run a small business. Look in the Gallery to see our list of needs.

You will get the satisfaction of knowing you are helping a child take their place in the world as a confident and productive citizen.

We will send you a picture hand drawn by one of the children for your contribution.

The Impact

The pigs will be sold at appropriate ages and money will be banked. The interest earned will be used to buy more pigs which will lead to extension of the project. Sale of pigs will also help provide for secondary school fees for the children. Some of the pigs will provide food for the orphanage.  The project will promote and encourage thrift and a sustainable life style among the orphans and the neighboring community. The Piggery Project will offer the children the confidence and encouragement to discover that they can do more for themselves. They can start their own income generating activities which will lead to self-employment.

Risks & Challenges

Geita is an area which is highly affected by HIV/AIDS, malaria and dysentery. The major reason for the spread of the pandemic is due to the presence of the gold mine and trans-road to Uganda, Rwanda and Burundi. Therefore, there is a growing number of orphans. As a means of assisting most of these marginalized children, the Diocese of Geita has built an orphanage Centre. Currently there are 100 orphans at the Centre. The Diocese has to take care of their full board. For each child at the Centre the Diocese has to use about US $1,000.00 per year. 

In order to continue with this mission and to open the door on the possibility of further assistance to other orphans, the Diocese welcomes generous donations towards the full boarding, school fees and tuition for our beloved children. 

  • Your donation will help provide sustenance and an education to these needy children.
  • The Moyo wa Huruma Piggery Project can become self-sustaining through a successful Indiegogo campaign.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
